review_text: It was so nice to spend a few days in this charming house. It's on a lovely quiet street. The surroundings are beautiful. And it's an easy walk to town. We were really happy with the clean and comfortable space for our family and would definitely stay again. Thanks!
This was a wonderful airbnb to stay at for my son's wedding. The place felt like home.
Great location for our tournament. We throughly enjoyed our stay!
Excellent location and value - a beautiful place, very clean, well appointed with everything you could possible need. Plus extremely cute and spacious!
Such a cute cozy home. Amber is a super kind and responsive host. There was a small issue with checkin time and we appreciate that she let us know. Would stay here again!
Very well-appointed and well-supplied. Everything we needed was there. The house was much more comfortable than we expected. Amber was very nice and accommodating. Would definitely stay there again.
The Comfy Bear Cottage was a wonderful place to stay and served as a great home base for our Sandpoint adventures! I would be happy to return!
We loved our stay at Amber’s house. It was clean, well stocked and great for a family stay.
Great house in a good, convenient location. Everything was super-easy and as described. Thanks for a great stay!
Great cozy condo. Close to downtown.
This place was very clean! Samuel is responsive and willing to help! It was walkable to downtown and groceries are extremely close!

Mike and Emma were excellent hosts. They were quick to communicate and checked in frequently to ensure we had the best stay. They even let us check in early and gave us the option to check out late (we didn’t need to). The home is cozy and the perfect size for two people. If you aren’t as mobile or have a difficult time getting up stairs, you may want to consider a different home. It’s a steep climb up to the bed. We didn’t have any issues, but want others to be aware just in case. The tiny home was perfect for a three night trip to visit some friends in town. We’d gladly stay again! Thanks, Mike & Emma!

The tiny home was charming and felt like a camping getaway while still being in the center of downtown! The location is very walkable and near all the great restaurants. Mike's instructions were very clear and he was very responsive to messages. I ended up having to check out early and Mike was very understanding and helpful.
Our second stay at the tiny house and it was perfect location and space for our needs.

Loved our stay. The tiny house had plenty of room for 2 people and there was a lot of attention to detail in the design/construction. We were 1 block from 2 outstanding restaurants. Highly recommended!
Tiny home was amazing. Mike was extremely responsive and location is great to walk around town. my girlfriend and I enjoyed every minute of it and would highly recommend!
Fun tiny home experience. Would stay again.

As advertised, this tiny home was cozy and enjoyable for our 2-night stay. All amenities were quite functional: porch, grill, kitchen, TV, shower, upstairs bed. Downtown location is perfect for walking to bars and restaurants.

What an amazing place to stay! We walked to downtown in less than 3 minutes, were a quick drive from Schweitzer, and had a wonderful time in the tiny house at Sandpoint!
Mike was proactive and super responsive from check in to check out, and the house had everything we needed and so much more.
We had such a great time and couldn't have picked a better place to stay for our first trip to Sandpoint. Thank you!!

Mike is still my favorite host out of any of my stays using airbnb! Amazing communication, and always a warm welcome! Incredible tiny home with intentional attention to detail and an awesome sound system throughout the house! And my daughter loves the fireplace and the loft bed with the hatch roof! Can’t wait to stay here again next summer✨

My week-long stay at Mike's Tinyhome in Sandpoint was an absolute delight! Despite its small size, the tiny home offered a cozy and warm atmosphere, even during cooler weather. The shower was nice and spacious, and the well-equipped kitchen made mornings a pleasure. Lounging with coffee and movies was a fantastic way to start the day.
While we didn't get a chance to use the barbecue and bicycles, their accessibility was appreciated. The outdoor lights created a lovely ambiance, and the loft area with its window overlooking the trees and sky was a unique and enjoyable experience.
Mike's guide to nearby activities and restaurants was a valuable resource, and the coffee provided was delicious, introducing us to a great coffee shop. The location of the tiny home was perfect, allowing us to walk around town, explore the beach, and enjoy nearby trails.
In summary, Mike's Tinyhome is a hidden gem in Sandpoint. I highly recommend it for a cozy and convenient stay. Thanks, Mike, for mak

We had the BEST stay in this adorable tiny house! My husband and I stayed there 2 nights with our 3yr-old son and 4yr-old daughter. The kids LOVED the upstairs bedroom loft (1 parent slept with them upstairs and the other on the super comfy futon). The hot water was seemingly endless and the shower pressure was perfect! The place was super clean and easy to find/enter. The dedicated parking spot was well shaded and located right in front of the tiny house (plenty of room for our sprinter van). The location was THE BEST (we walked downtown to restaurants/stores often). The host was very friendly and responsive. I highly recommend staying here- it was an experience our family will never forget (the kids were so bummed we had to leave “their” tiny house). We will definitely stay again the next time we visit Sandpoint!

We loved our stay in Sandpoint! The location could not have been better for us since we wanted an easily walkable area with lots to do. The house was exactly as described and allowed us a great space to relax and unwind!
a gem of stay in this walkable town. cozy & not too tiny, just right!
The house was super clean! Mike left two bikes that were great to ride around town!
Great place to stay. Very helpful host.
Place was very nice. Great location to be able to walk down town and to the city beach. Parking off street and a patio to chill on. The place felt very comfortable. Would stay again
Mike's place is so cute and just perfect for the amenities and the location. I LOVED staying there.

The tiny home was excellent! Cute, quaint and well thought out. It is very close walking distance to shops, restaurants and the city beach. The home was super clean and had everything you needed for your stay. We would definitely rent Mikes home again if visiting Sandpoint!
Very beautiful home! would return
Great location!

Just the perfect little space for all the outdoor things we had planned for our weekend, and easy to take care of... Mike our host had everything set up and so perfect... he even provided bicycles and locks for our enjoyment that were not part of his listing. The upstairs loft had a great extending window that made it feel like you were sleeping outside under the stars. And he provided a French press and the local Evans Brothers coffee, IMHO the best.
Mike was a terrific host and the place was perfect for our visit to sandpoint! Easy walk to restaurants and the beach. We will be back!
Great tiny house with a sleeping loft and sleepable futon. Great for a couple or 2 people. Well-equipped and the location is perfect with your own parking spot.

The tiny house was perfect. We are a family of 4 and I thought it might be tight but the lay out was perfect and the outdoor space really added extra room for us. The location was perfect walking distance to all the fun things we wanted to do. The instructions we received before check in covered everything!

I really like the Tiny House experience and try to seek them out when I travel. I enjoyed the location of this one the most. The Sandpoint Farmer's market is not to be missed and the near by organic grocery store has everything you can imagine and great baked goods.
Super cozy and cute and had everything we needed. Perfect for our family of 4.

This is our 3rd time staying at the Tiny House on 3rd street, it’s become a tradition for our little family. We absolutely love staying here. Everything is so thoughtful from the fully stocked kitchen to the linens and extra blanket and even the bathroom is well stocked. The queen size bed is very comfortable and wonderful to look at the sky through the skylight at night. For a Tiny House I would not expect such details. It truly is steps to downtown area with lots of sweet little restaurants, coffee shops and shopping. Easy walk to the city beach as well. When we travel our goal is to drive as little as possible and this is the perfect place to stay if you want to walk everywhere with ease. We’ll be back again next year!

We loved our stay in the Tiny house. It was in a fantastic location, quiet, beautiful trees and we could walk to everything! Mike was great at communication and check-in/out were a breeze. Such a cool place to stay!

Mike’s tiny house is the most ingeniously laid out place to stay. Easily accommodated both of us who are over 6 feet tall. Perfectly situated for access to the town with everything you need. Would recommend as a great place to stay.
Mike was very helpful and provided a great property. You can walk from Mike's tiny house to City Beach and all the main attractions in Sandpoint.
What a lovely little place! Super walkable but also tucked away and private. Mike was easy to communicate with as well. I'd love to stay here again if I'm ever back in Sandpoint! (
Clean, cozy, everything you need. Walkable to downtown. Highly recommended.

I couldn’t have asked for a better stay in Sandpoint. Location was ideal: walking distance from everything (including the lake), and still, secluded enough to make evenings on the porch peaceful and private. And the property itself was a true delight: cozier than even the photos suggest, high quality fixtures throughout, and every little detail thought through to make it feel like home. Highly, highly recommended!

Mike is a great communicator. He anticipates questions really well and usually provides an answer before you need to ask. The tiny house provided everything I needed. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Mikes tiny home was very nice and clean. The owners were extremely responsive when we had questions and made life very easy

Thanks Mike for a great stay. It was quiet and peaceful, yet 3 blocks from downtown and easy to walk around and to the beach. The tiny home had everything needed and was very cozy and well thought out. Great to meet you as well!
Thank you Mike! We will definitely stay at Mike’s tiny house again while in Sandpoint!

This is such a cute little Tiny House! It’s location right in the downtown area is perfect for getting to nice restaurants, shopping, and sight-seeing. The place was very clean - we did end up sleeping on the fold out futon in the living room and it was quite comfy! My husband and I enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this adorable little spot!
Winter weather and a busy schedule kept us from doing the usual walks around the neighborhood but it is definitely a place I will come back to if I have the chance.

Great location with easy walk to downtown, restaurants, the lake, and elsewhere. Place is cozy and would only really recommend for 2ppl though 4 could fit. Be sure not to turn off the water piping heater as we learned the hard way and had to wait for the pipes to unfreeze. Mike was helpful though and we had access to water and a bathroom next door.
The tiny home was the perfect basecamp for our ski weekend and close to everything in Sandpoint.

Had a great time at the tiny house. Cottage guests at his place next door were obnoxiously loud in the middle of the night and kept us up for a couple hours, but other than that we had a perfect stay.

Mike was super friendly and helpful multiple times. He went out of his way and was a great host.
The space was great and both my friend and I loved it there.
Can’t wait to stay again!!!!
The tiny house is everything it's advertised to be. It's in a great location to access all the downtown amenities and is in a quiet location. I highly recommend it for a stay in Sandpoint.

Tiny House is in walking distance from the best spots in beautiful downtown Sandpoint. Checkin and checkout were super easy. The house was charming, clean, and had everything we were expecting. Mike was friendly, very responsive to our messages, and accommodating when we forgot some of our things there and had to return after checkout. The value for the price we paid was exceptional.

Beautiful place within walking distance of everything downtown. A romantic ambience within & without. Definitely didn't want to leave and will return. The coolest thing about it was the endless hot water supply!

Mike was a responsive host - check in and communication was easy and we even arrived to a driveway and sidewalk free of snow. The place was clean and as expected from the description. I’d stay here again!
Very cool place, great location, would come back again if Im in town!

Great place with a great host. This was my second stay at this location and I’ll be back again. Had the pleasure of meeting the host and he was extremely friendly, informative, and helpful. Check in and check out instructions were clear. Great internet and tv options too for downtime.
Fantastic, cozy cottage just a short walk to everything Sandpoint!
Great location. The squirrel mafia kept throwing walnuts at the roof, but we'd totally stay here again.

This place is awesome. Super centrally located and easy to check in, with everything you would need. I live in my minivan so it was nice to stretch my legs in this tiny house - though most people might find it smaller than their usual living set ups hah. Wifi had some trouble staying connected, but i have a hotspot on my phone so working was no problem, and i went over to the coffee shop for most of the day anyway. Mike is super cool too - all in all great experience. I will be back!

Cleanliness is very important to me, and this tiny house was immaculate! Everything was exactly as described in the pictures and listing. Great amenities, including Roku TV, fire pit, and skylight. Host is very responsive and willing to make your stay the best it can be. Highly recommend!

Mike's Tiny House is incredible. Perfect location for checking out Sandpoint's wonderful downtown and everything is exactly as described. It was very impressive and evident to see the hard work that went into the tiny house and its efficient nature! Everything is well thought out and this is a unique stay and one of the reasons I love Airbnb!! If you've read this far, then definitely stay here!

We LOVED staying here. It’s such a convenient walk to town.
We went to the farmers market, walked back to unload. Went to the winery, walked back to unload. Walked to the brewery and had drinks at dinner… walked back.
I also loved the rooftop window above the bed that opens, closes, and has a shade for sleeping. We will be back!
I really enjoyed my stay here. It was well appointed, clean and in great shape, and the location was perfect. It was a great value and I would definitely stay here again.

We loved the tiny house. It was perfect for two people. It has speakers built into the ceiling and Bluetooth capability. The bathroom was bigger than I thought it would be. Full sized shower! The deck was lovely and the stringed lights were a nice added touch!

Everything you need tucked into a tiny house. My stay was amazing. I really wanted to experience living is a small efficient space. The location is a good bonus. I just parked my car and walked everywhere….downtown, farmers market, lake and beach. Thank you!
Awesome location and very cozy place in Sandpoint, nearby all the action downtown and not too far from the beach!
awesome little house, location is perfect and close to everything downtown
Tiny House was perfect.
Great stay! It’s centrally located and everything in downtown Sandpoint was walkable. It was very quiet too and I was able to get great rest. I highly recommend staying here.
The cabin was perfectly organized and super efficient. Great place to stay, looking forward to next time.

Quaint Tiny House tucked in a downtown block of Sand Point, ID. It was perfect for one person, but I felt it would've been too small for four. Nice extra touches with local, fresh coffee beans, grinder and brewing options. Mike the Host was easy to communicate with and very attentive.
Very nice accommodations just a stones throw from downtown and City Beach. Host provides everything you need and then some. Very quiet too. We will be back.

This was my family’s second stay here this year. We absolutely love it. Everything we need has been made available by the owner. Very comfy bed and futon. Super cozy and cutely decorated. Very nicely stocked as well from dishes, to towels and toiletries. So close to everything downtown, we really enjoyed walking everywhere and not having to drive. Already planning the next trip and stay here!

Fantastic. Blocks from the bi-weekly farmers market, the city beach, and Sandpoint’s staples: The Hydra steakhouse and Joel’s Mexican restaurant. It’s a comfortable tiny home; in the middle of a heat wave the AC unit had to be turned off and on intermittently because it worked so well.
My wife and I are planning a return trip for the winter season and have this bookmarked.
Loved it.

We loved staying in this place! The location couldn’t be better, and you can tell that Mike has really put thought into making sure the tiny house has everything you might need! Sandpoint is beautiful and this was a perfect place to stay. Thank you so much Mike!
Great tiny house experience, right next to downtown. It's a good home base for adventures in Sandpoint.
2nd time staying at this awesome tiny home in a great location downtown Sandpoint! Mike does a great job communicating and the place is clean and well taken care of! We will be back!

Easy check-in, good communication, clear direction. Great location, close to everything in town - easy to walk to lake, restaurants, bars, etc. and even easier if you have a bike. Host accommodated a last minute request for us, which was greatly appreciated. Pictures of the property are accurate.

Easily one of my favorite Airbnb stays ever! Mike’s place was beautiful and cozy and modern and in the perfect location. We walked everywhere to eat and shop, then watched movies and played games in the house. Couldn’t be happier with our stay!

Mike's place offers a wonderful lodging option to enjoy the sights and beautiful scenery of Sandpoint, Idaho. The place is clean and quiet. Mike is a very attentive and hospitable host. We highly recommend the tiny home.

This location is perfect! I was able to just walk everywhere and had no stress of having to find parking everywhere I went. Mike was great about checking in on my stay. If I ever needed anything, I had no doubts he would respond quickly. Would definitely recommend!

Mike was a great host .. I particularly liked that he was around to greet me and made sure that I was comfortable.. He got back to me right away when I made any request.. my only comment otherwise if the windows and the outside BQ area need some attention

Loved it! I'm about 6' 2" and had some reservations about staying in a tiny home for a week, but this place was perfect - definitely room for one more.
It's well appointed, warm and comfortable - full size shower and bathroom and the kitchen is big enough to prep a few meals, or make some coffee/tea and sit back and relax on the private patio.
Definitely recommend and will stay again when I'm back up here!
Very clean and cute tiny house located with in walking distance to great restaurants, brewery’s, and shops. Loved our stay.
awesome spot. great host
Nice spot to stay in the center of town for a week long stay. Walking distance from the lake, several coffee shops, restaurants, and pubs.

Mike's tiny house is the perfect jumping off place for your Sandpoint adventures. It is close to downtown, so good restaurants and shopping are just a few blocks away. The house itself is well stocked for cooking in, and was very comfortable for the three of us. If you love tiny houses, you will want to check this one out.
Great place in a great location! Which is why I've stayed there on multiple occasions. Mike is super communicative and friendly. Thanks!
Great place and location. Mike was a great host. We enjoyed our time in Sandpoint and staying at the Tiny House.

What an excellent place to stay. We are a family of 4, 2 adults and 2 little kids and this worked great for us. The upstairs bed is so very comfortable and spacious. And I’m highly sensitive to sleeping anywhere but my own bed. The weather during our stay was quite cold but we kept warm with just the little space heater provided. The kitchen was very nicely stocked, we didn’t do any cooking but had we wanted to I think it would have been easy. Very close walking distance to anything downtown. Easy parking and we loved that it’s fully gated for our kids. We can’t wait to stay here again in the warmer months to take advantage of the cute deck, fire pit and more of what Sandpoint has to offer! Highly recommend this gem in Sandpoint!
Mike was an excellent host. Location is great for walking to restaurants and around the downtown area.
We had 3 people staying in this tiny home for over and week and we absolutely loved the stay! Heater worked great, shower was amazing! Even had some speakers built in the ceiling. Overall 10/10
Awesome place. Great location close to restaurants and shops.
Great place, location and quietness. Perfect location for a getaway for a few days. Very close to the downtown area and the lake. Cozy and comfortable!
Such a cute tiny home! Perfect for myself as a solo traveler or a couple traveling to Sandpoint. The location was great and the place had everything I needed!
A cozy little spot in a fantastic location! We enjoyed our stay very much :)
Clean and quiet
Fantastic location and a great host!Everything we wanted was a short walk away and the house was perfect.
This tiny house and Sandpoint is sweet. I hope to return soon.

Welcoming an inviting tiny house and tiny living. we stayed for a weekend and perfect for 2! Having four will be very cozy but doable of the weather is warm outside and you can take advantage of the deck
The location can not be beat and designated parking was so nice. We enjoyed the design and attention to details. It was a fun stay.
Great location, value, and space! We loved our time here. So fun to stay in a real tiny house. The place was perfect for two. Clean, cozy, and modern.

This was a great place to stay! House was very functional and cute. Cozy sleeping area and great compact kitchen, plenty of room to make pancakes. Made me want to move into a tiny house. Great location and loved walking around town right from the house.

So glad we booked this spot for a ski weekend at Schweitzer. Extremely close to downtown and had everything we could need. Getting the temperature inside just right during the winter was a little difficult (propane heater and space heater available), but this did not detract from our experience. Would definitely stay here again!
Very clean and cozy! My husband and I stayed for several nights and loved how close the house was to Schweitzer as well as located downtown. We walked to restaurants only a few blocks away.
Great spot, walking distance to everything. Cozy and clean.

Mike's place was a great cozy place to stay. We had a last minute change of plan and Mike was also really accommodating for us which was much appreciated. The place is less than a few minutes walking to restaurants and breakfast spots that you can hit before going to the mountain. While we never got to meet face to face there was good communication and overall had a great time in Sandpoint!
Pleasant tiny house and close to downtown Sandpoint!

This tiny house was beautiful and had everything you might need for a nice stay. It's right in the center of a quaint little town. We visited in the middle of a snow storm and the house was well stocked and easily warm enough throughout the stay. Over it was a great tiny house for our mini vacation.

Such a perfect spot. Wonderful location, and the tiny house itself has everything you could need. They really did think of everything. Two adults and two kiddos stayed there comfortably. We loved it and will come back for sure.
Had a fantastic stay — such a wonderful spot! Cozy & comfortable, so much of Sandpoint within easy walking distance.
Great place. As described, it is a Tiny House and was pretty much perfect for what I was looking for. Location was super convenient to walk to almost everything you'd want.

The place is sooo cute and perfectly located! It had everything you need for the perfect getaway if you want to eat in the whole time, or visit all the restaurants that Sandpoint has to offer! A definite must stay!
We loved the tiny house experience. Nice and quiet neighborhood, and a super easy walk into town for coffee.
Absolutely terrific stay—highly recommend. Thoughtful communication, clean and cosy place!
Awesome place to stay! It provided everything we needed and kept us warm. I would recommend this to anyone!

Imagine a cozy, clean, glowing, close to everything home... yep, this is it! Super good experience in Mike's tiny home... small yet functional with a wonderfully hot and relaxing shower. The kitchen is stocked with everything we needed-we ate in except one meal- and we really appreciated the organic products(spices, oil) The porch/grill combo is delicious in any weather and the neighborhood tabby kitty may become your new best friend(we named him Turmeric).
Mike is genuinely kind, close by and happy to answer any question or request. We thoroughly enjoyed our trip and chats with Mike.
Wow, what an amazing experience. It was adorable and the best location for a weekend getaway.
Mike’s tiny home was a perfect cozy getaway! I was especially impressed with 4 different options to make a quality cup of coffee :)

Mikes Tiny House is perfectly located, adjacent to the adorable downtown of Sandpoint with the benefit of the quietness of a neighborhood. The tiny house was a fun and unique place to stay, with a bonus private front patio and seating area. It’s very clean and efficient and well organized. We chose to use both the loft bed and the futon bed as two adults used to having a little more space at night and slept well. Mike is a very friendly and accommodating host. He checked in with us regularly and responded quickly to a couple of questions we had. Sandpoint is a destination worth putting in your travel list. The town is charming and walkable and progressive while staying quaint and naturally beautiful. Our friends came for vacation from Florida and purchased a condo to return to immediately upon their return home! Thank you, Mike, for a wonderful stay. I highly recommend this affordable and comfortable and memorable home and experience!
Location, location! Everything is in walking distance. We loved the outdoor space and the tiny house was perfect!
Quiet, clean, comfortable and well-equipped. We had a great time exploring downtown on foot and felt very relaxed and at home in the Tiny House.
The tiny home was a perfect location for access to downtown. Clean and homey. Great response time from Mike. Highly recommend!

What a treat! Mike’s place was perfect for what we needed. It was decorated beautifully and had all the essentials. Everything was within walking distance and the surrounding town is so charming and fun. We would definitely stay here again.
Great stay if you’d like to experience tiny home living and be walkable to everything downtown Sandpoint has to offer!
Mike was wonderful and super personable! His suggestions for where to eat/what to do in town were so helpful!

This is a charming wee house — and it IS wee, but the layout is such that it doesn’t feel at all cramped or crowded; my husband and I stayed with our teenage son, and we were all very comfortable.
The house was immaculately clean; furnishings, fixtures, and and appliances are high-end and in excellent repair; the deck and yard are great spaces; the location is great; and the owner provides great options for coffee-lovers!
Thanks for a great stay!

The Tiny House is a perfect place for a stay in Sandpoint. Walking distance to everything the downtown has to offer. The house has everything you need to make your stay enjoyable. When in the area we would definitely stay again.
Great stay! Great location!

This is a cute gem! Super walkable to Sandpoint, clean and had everything we needed! We traveled with our two tween’s and we were perfectly comfortable. The stairs to the main bed are steep- which was not a problem for us, but probably wouldn’t recommend for someone with bad knees or balance issues. Mike was a great host. We would highly recommend this tiny house!

The pictures don’t do this adorable place justice! So tastefully done and packed with just the right amenities. The location to shopping, city beach, and restaurants was perfect and communication with Mike could not have been better. Absolutely would recommend this place for a couple’s trip or friend’s weekend away!

Great location, easy check-in, perfectly described.
If you're there on one of these ridiculously hot days we've been having, I suggest turning the AC down to cool the upstairs bedroom, it works great.
Thanks Mike!
Wonderful tiny house with thoughtful touches. Great location. Would definitely stay here again!
Wonderful location and great host. Clean and comfy.
Perfect location and a great tiny home experience.
Awesome place!!!

This was a delightful stay, in a delightful property, in a delightful town. I arrived on the Amtrak at 2:30AM, but Mike was super helpful with directions and the door access code. The house is cute but very functional with everything you might need. I especially liked the outdoor grilling area and the additional coffee beans with grinder and multiple brewing methods. The loft is cosy, the AC is cold and the WiFi (after a brief tweak from Mike) is fast. The location is great for the wonderful food and drink options in Sandpoint, and only 10 mins walk from the beach- so refreshing to jump in the lake on a warm day.
This is a new property with a couple of small outstanding snag items, but Mike is hugely receptive to getting everything in perfect condition ASAP. I hope that I can come back some day soon.
The Tiny House was great, location was perfect for exploring Sandpoint and Mike was on top of everything and communicated really well with us throughout the visit!

Mike’s place was fabulous! He thought of all the little details. The place was clean, quiet, right next to downtown, and had plenty of space for 3 people. We cooked there and had no problems. The fire pit was also nice and fun to have!

We stayed here for 4th of July weekend with my husband and 2 kids. Walked to the parade, shops, restaurants, lake, and fireworks show. Mike had the house fully stocked with essentials and was beautifully decorated. As a parent to young kids I really appreciated the black out shades!

Mike was a great host, he was on site when we arrived and checked in frequently to make sure everything was okay. We loved the house and wish that we hadn't arrived in the middle of record breaking heat wave so that we could spend more time on the deck or at the fire pit.
The house didn't have A/C, and Mike and I talked about what to do about the heat, once we got all the windows & the skylight open, it cooled down quick in the evening.

Wonderful clean and modern house in an amazing location. Walked to town and the beach. We appreciated how aesthetic everything was- matching plates and utensils, decorative plants. The porch was lovely to sit out under the shady trees. Great communication with the host.
This was a really cute place to stay, and Mike was very good at communicating. There was an issue with the water heater, but Mike warned us ahead of time and worked to fix things.

Mike was a great host who answered our questions quickly. The tiny house was very clean with many extras that made it great. Enjoyed the covered deck and the fire pit area also. Will recommend it to others and plan to come back.
Great location within walking distance of several restaurants, bars, and other places. The tiny home is a perfect place for small groups. The speakers in the ceiling are awesome!
Good stay - very clean, organized, and walking distance from other interesting spots in town.

Mike was a great host! The house was clean and very nicely put together with the porch and added bbq and gas fireplace outside! The location of it is also great! The place was within walking distance to everything downtown and was a very nice experience in Sandpoint! We will definitely be booking again!

Best Airbnb experience I’ve had to date!👏🏼
Absolutely amazing Tiny home that doesn’t feel Tiny at all, especially with the big yard that includes a fire pit, gas bbq, table, and chairs,and the best part....the hanging night lights on the patio! & That’s just outside!! Inside was even cooler. I took my 6 year old daughter here when I came to visit sandpoint and she absolutely loved it! The loft bed was fun and the sky window above The bed I think may have been my favorite part of the whole home! It opens up and also Has an optional bug screen u can pull down that was perfect for us at night to be able to sleep with the window open! Amazing details in the kitchen- included salt, pepper, spices, coffee, (all organic), & every pot, pan,cast iron skillet, and kitchen item you’d possibly need. And my other favorite part was the built in ceiling speakers that connect to Bluetooth and allowed us to play music whenever we wanted throughout the house! This will be my first choice in sandpoint anytime I return no questions asked!🙏🏻✌🏼👏🏼
Great, fully equipped tiny house. Location is terrific for walking to city beach and restaurants. Host is great and very helpful.

Great place to stay and explore Sandpoint. Nice neighborhood. Mike was very responsive to our requests and had lots of great suggestions. The Tiny House isn’t exactly as described, in our opinion it was even better. We loved sitting by the fire table talking, the deck was great! Inside they have nice dishes and pans and bedding, all much better than I even have at home and actually had to ask where he got some of the kitchen ware it was so nice. The only bad thing I have to say is the weather wasn’t great when we were there, but as far as this place to stay...if you like Tiny Houses, this one is a gem! If you have any mobility issues the stairs to the loft are steep so be aware of that, but they have great hand rails and they aren’t bad. My husband and I are aging so we noticed in a few years we may not be able to climb them. We hope to return and explore more in better weather and when we do we will definitely be staying here if it’s available!!

My partner and I were looking for a quick mini-vacation and this hit the spot! The tiny house was adorable and in a really nice location, right downtown and close to restaurants, parks and the beach. We could walk to about 90% of the restaurants we wanted to check out. I was little worried about my suitcase and storage, but there were lots of little spaces to store my toiletries & clothes. The space was so clean and furnished really nicely. It really didn't feel all that small, especially with the nice deck and outdoor space. Another bonus is that while the weather got pretty warm, there was enough shade that we were always comfortable inside. I highly recommend this spot!
This is a perfect tiny home in a perfect location. It was very comfortable. I can highly recommend a stay at this home.

Our tiny house stay was wonderful. The place is so cozy, clean and fun. The fire out back was a great addition for the chilly spring evenings. Mike was super informative and helpful, as well as being quick to answer any and all questions. 10/10 stay.

Such a lovely little spot! My friend and I stopped in Sandpoint to break up the drive to Banff. Jodi was super friendly, a great communicator, and the place itself was wonderful! Sparkling clean with lots of cute touches. Would definitely stay here again!

This location was perfect! Close enough to walk downtown or to the waterfront. Cute little place with the most comfy bed and best pillows!! Jodi was great and helpful for recommendations and information.
Thank you! We enjoyed the little gem and it was perfect for what we needed.

Super cute, small, but well-appointed studio, right downtown! Bed and pillows were comfortable. Everything downtown has to offer is walkable from the studio, and Jodi left her driveway open for my car, which I thought was very kind. I only had a couple brief interactions with Jodi but she was very kind and welcoming. Will definitely stay here again!
Great place, close to downtown!

Our short stay was very comfortable and cozy. Loved the peaceful atmosphere and decor. Fire pit and grill with the private patio area put the stay well above any hotel. Host was amazing and offered to turn out the sofa bed for us after a long day. Location is a short drive or bike ride to restaurants and the beach. Would definitely stay here again!
This was a perfect place for the two of us to rest our heads in Sandpoint. It is conveniently located and with walking distance to restaurants and the lakefront.
Jodi was extremely kind and welcoming. The place was squeaky clean, smelled amazing, adorable decor and very peaceful! I would absolutely stay here again

"The Little Gem" is truly a gem! It's a beautiful and very cozy place for a couple that enjoys or wants to try out tiny living. Easy walking and/or biking to downtown and the park. All with a thoughtful and wonderful host to make sure you have everything you need for a pleasant stay!
Had a lovely time at Jodi's Bnb, very close to many lovely restaurants and the lake. Very clean, very well decorated space that we enjoyed! Highly recommend.
Absolutely loved my stay! Space was very cute. The neighborhood was adorable and being able to walk around and explore was a highlight. Thanks for the hospitality!
Jodi was very accommodating as she allowed us to have an extra trailer on our pickup. Nice little place and good location!

Cozy place, clean, nice patio with BBQ. walking distance to shops and dinning. Absolutely perfect for a couple to enjoy Sandpoint.
Highly recommend
Jodi was a stellar host and a charming human being! She was generous and kind, and the unit is absolutely adorable. I loved it ❤️

The Little Gem is indeed a Gem! Great location for Sandpoint! Easy to walk everywhere. The place is immaculate, well appointed, and very cute. the bed is super comfy and the shower has good hot water! Jodi and Michael are very kind, friendly, and respectful. we really enjoyed our stay and will stay again if it's available in the future. The outdoor area with a firepit looks fabulous - we didn't have time to make use of it, but it would be great to sit and relax by a fire in the evening. Thanks Jodi and Michael!
Just as the title says A Little Gem! Small but spacious at the same time. Everything needed for a weekend getaway!
Beautiful studio cabin overlooking Sandpoint. Very peaceful while also being close to town. 10/10 recommend
We loved our stay at Erika's place! It felt welcoming and homey and we'll definitely stay again next time we're in Sandpoint!

What an absolutely wonderful little AirBnB. The views are spectacular and the place had everything we needed and then some. This places had great vibes and probably the best view out of all the BnB’s we have stayed in. We would love to stay here again.

This was our first visit to the area and we booked at the last minute. The hosts were awesome. Very proactive, friendly and knowledgeable. The space is beautiful and the view is amazing. We hope to come back and visit again.

We really enjoyed the weekend, the cabin is so comfortable and well designed and has amazing views!! Modern, clean and right on the mountain where you can hop on the trail just steps away! 5 stars from our doggie pal too 😊

lovely place to rest for a couple days. had everything we needed, bed was comfortable, bathroom was very nice and clean. beautiful views and close to the McKinnis trail. Would love to stay again in nicer weather but even the rain was nice to listen to at night and in the morning.
Loved our stay here

My fiance and I loved our stay here. The views are so beautiful and we loved that we were able to take our dog with us. It is such a relaxing place up in the woods yet is close to hiking trails and right near sandpoint where we were able to adventure.

We celebrated our 20th anniversary here. This cabin was clean, cozy, and had million dollar views! If you are looking for a comfortable, peaceful getaway that's still close to amenities - this is your place!

We only stayed one night, but would love to return. The space is really comfortable and stylish, and the panoramic views are jaw dropping. It’s a little slice of heaven just minutes from all of Sandpoint’s amenities.

This place is AMAZING. Photos don’t do the views or the place justice. 5+ stars for everything - location, cleanliness, views, comfort, all of it. Miraculously we were here during the northern lights which was unreal. Will stay here again. Awesome hosts, awesome place.
Such a lovely space loved staying there, great hosts!
We enjoyed staying at Erika’s guest cabin while passing through Sandpoint on a roadtrip. The cabin had nice, modern amenities and was very clean!

Absolutely phenomenal stay! Alex was so warm and welcoming and took care of any and everything we needed and even things we didn’t know we needed (thank you for the electrolytes!!) He even went so far as to start a fire so it was ready for us while we were out getting dinner. Amazing. Truly spectacular little home in the hills with an unbelievable view of city, lake, and mountains. The wonderful hospitality has assured us that this is a place we want to visit again and again.
Super great host. Very friendly and approachable. Will definitely be back.

Wow, what a spectacular view! I decided to spend the night here (versus a chain hotel) before an early morning flight from GEG (Spokane Airport). And I'm so glad I did. As soon as I stepped out of the vehicle, my jaw just dropped. The town and the lake were nestled below us, and it was such an idyllic setting. While I selected the cabin for the view, the interior was equally impressive. The decorations and furnishings all felt like Idaho, and it was evident that the owners wanted to showcase their state and town (e.g., an Idaho license plate and Mickinnick Trailhead sign). It's so wonderful to see the pride of place! The cabin exemplifies the best of Airbnb. A minor side note about Sandpoint is that trains run through the town during all hours. However, this setting in the hills is much better for noise-sensitive individuals than one in the valley. Overall, it was a superb experience and well-run accommodation.
Absolutely beautiful view, easy check-in, and great/kind hosts. Would highly recommend!
This Airbnb is I think the best Airbnb we have ever stayed at! Very friendly and responsive. Gorgeous view and a nice homey feel. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Such a beautiful place to stay!! We enjoyed staying and the view was amazing! Highly recommend this place for a weekend gateway! We will definitely be back
We truly enjoyed our stay. We appreciated that our dog was a welcome guest also. The hosts were very responsive and accommodating.
Erika and Alex were very helpful. Their place was beautiful and they were so accommodating.
This was my second time here, and it was just as incredible as I remembered it!
Loved this place. Would definitely stay here again
Perfect place!
Awesome little cabin In the woods overlooking the lake. The high ceilings and picture windows gave the place an incredible feel.

Beautiful views, clean space, very responsive. Would definitely stay here again!
Great little place close to town with great views. I will stay again next time I go to the area. enjoyed.
Always my go-to stay when in sandpoint. Great spot, great view, easy access to the mountain.
the views were amazing! a short drive to downtown and very private! we will be back to stay in this cute cabin again. highly recommend.

Our second stay at the Scenic Mountain Retreat. It was just as wonderful as the first time. Erika and Alex are wonderful hosts. Alex was even plowing the road as we were leaving for skiing one day. Charming Airbnb with a fantastic view!
This place was wonderful. The locations is great - it has great views and is just a short drive up to schweitzer. The amenities were as described in the listing.

My stay at this Airbnb was amazing! The hosts were friendly and accommodating, and the scenery outside the window was breathtaking. The most beautiful sunrises and views to take in across Sandpoint, lake and mountains.

I stayed for two nights with my goldendoodle pup Rooster and we loved our stay. The view is incredible, the cabin is cozy, and Sandpoint has a lot of fun outdoor activities to offer. I can't wait to come back and visit in the summer months.
Absolutely perfect getaway location very near Schweitzer with lovely hosts. Highly recommend for anyone who would like a scenic, peaceful, clean, luxury cabin experience. Can't wait to return.
Great stay at this modern lodging close to town. We would stay again!

Wonderful place to stay! Great location! Home away from home
Great stay. Nice and cozy.

A wonderful stay! The view is incredible and the hosts are so friendly and welcoming. 10/10 experience!
Really enjoyed my stay at Alex and Erika’s cabin. They were super responsive and friendly. Will definitely visit again.

Erika’s place was wonderful to stay at!
Wish we could of had another day to explore the area and enjoy the comfortable cabin!
This was our second time at Alex and Erika’s cabin, and we hope we will go back again!

Erika and Alex’s cabin was wonderful! Excellent views, all the amenities, and a cozy set up. Our pup loved it as well. Highly recommend!
Felt like home away from home. we'll back for sure
Warm and cozy with a beautiful view. A last minute booking that went perfectly. Thank you ❤️

Love this place. One of my favorite Airbnbs out there.
This place is awesome!! Perfect set up and love the heated toilet seats!!!

Cutest little abode with a gorgeous view.

Wow, was this place ever cute. We stayed here while traveling back home and enjoyed it so much that we’re already thinking about coming back for ski season. The sunrise and the lake offered an amazing view for our morning coffee.
A beautiful little hideaway in the mountain. We enjoyed our stay. Super clean and cozy. We enjoyed our time watching the snow fall and checking out Sandpoint.
This cabin has an amazing view of the lake at any time of day. The fall colors were just spectacular during my stay. This is the perfect place to unplug and relax.

Nice clean studio. We only stayed one short night, but it was comfortable. Great views, nice, clean, modern, and private studio, even though the owners are right next door. What we assume to be their dog, a beautiful Irish setter or setter mix, was very very keen to give an enthusiastic welcome. Lots of deer around!

Erika and Alex have a fantastic Airbnb home! The view is just incredible, we loved sitting outside and just basking in it.
The tiny home was sweet and comfortable. The hosts were super friendly and gave us tips for restaurants too.
Highly recommend!
Would stay again
Wonderful place!
This place was a dream to stay in with wonderful views and everything that you could need. Erika was quick to respond and super accommodating!
Erika’s place is beautiful and cozy, with breathtaking views. Woke up to an amazing sunrise!

A sweet perch on the mountainside with unmatched views. Alex went above and beyond to ensure our first AirBnb experience exceeded our expectations. Would have loved to stay longer but grateful for our time there.

Erika and Alex's place was exactly what we were looking for in our time at Sandpoint, close in - yet felt far away. So peaceful and very kind host! Loved the stay!

Very reasonable price for such a scenic and clean place.
Thanks for the wonderful stay! Beautiful location and we'll be back soon!

The views are incredible and the space is extremely comfortable. We had a cozy stay, our vehicle was safe and late check out allowed us to enjoy our morning before getting back on the road. 5 star experience.
Great hosts and amazing Views!
The view is breathtaking!! Excited the house was available during our stay in Sandpoint. Would recommend 100%!🥰
the stay was great and hope to come back every summer!

Would highly recommend! The place was clean and in a great location. Would definitely come back next time we’re in Sandpoint!

Can't recommend this place enough! Located up on a mountain away from the town/crowds. So peaceful! Wonderful weekend getaway! Beautiful view and welcoming hosts!
this little home is well worth it! highly recommend coming here for a quiet getaway and to see the amazing view of sandpoint! Alex and Erika were very kind and welcoming!

Two big thumbs up for this cottage and Erika and Alex!

What a fantastic property! Friendly hosts, beautiful surroundings, and an amazing view!

This is the perfect place to stay in the Sandpoint area. Erika is the perfect host. Helpful and available to assist with the many questions you have. This property is perfect great location- private but very easy access to all the area has to offer. There is no reason to stay at anywhere else in Sandpoint. The view is outstanding. If you go to Sandpoint this is where you should stay!!!! The added benefit of having this family as your host. We will be back.

Alex and Erika were perfect hosts. The place has beautiful arial views of the lake and Airport (for av geeks) and they stock it with plenty of conveniences in case you forget something. Beautiful stay! Stunning views and well decorated. Perfect for a romantic getaway!

Sandpoint is beautiful and for a place that felt remote to us, there were plenty of great food options. We’ll definitely be making plans to go back and enjoy everything the area has to offer!
Great little place with beautiful views! Would definitely stay here again.

great location and great views, quiet and serene. will definitely be back.

Great place! Beautiful views of the valley and lake.

Stunning view and just adorable as ever. Thank you for letting me and 🐶 Frankie. Stay we will definitely be back.

My wife and I had a great time at Erika’s place. It has a spectacular view of the lake and mountains! The cabin was very clean and well appointed. Excellent accommodations for a weekend at Schweitzer! Peaceful and quiet with super easy check in. We’d happily stay here again.
