Beautiful condo in the perfect location! We came here on our first family vacation with our 1 year old, and had the best experience. Loved being water front, but still only having a 5 minute walk to the heart of downtown. Super clean, homey, beautiful finishes and lots of amenities. We loved having the pool be basically right out the back door, and spent a lot of time on the patio in the evenings. Great family friendly condo. We definitely want to come back next year!
Great, clean get away.
The condo was nice and access to the lake great!

Nice modern condo, perfect getaway for two people. The place is pretty close to downtown. They offer kayaks and bikes with your stay. My wife and I rode the bikes every morning to go get coffee. It was great.

Great location. We enjoyed the pool and bikes. It was very convenient to walk or bike to restaurants and to the beach. Recently remodeled with a stylish decor. Very clean and well stocked. The washer and dryer were great to have so we could pack light. It's a small space, but that was perfect for our family of three. There is good separation between the living area and the bedroom. The king bed was super comfortable, but bring earplugs and a sleeping mask if you are sensitive. There was a lot of noise from the upstairs units and light through the blinds that made it hard to sleep once the sun came up.

This condo is great, perfect location to downtown/lake/pool, provides all of the extras you could possibly want-bikes/kayaks/basketball/tennis gear/life jackets/bike helmets/bocce ball, shampoos and conditioner, k-cup coffee and creamer, beach towels, bath robes....you guys thought of everything!!! Thank you!

The condo is beautiful, exceptionally high quality remodel and finish. View from the porch of pool and river is lovely! It’s well located with a short walk to city center, and parking is extremely easy. You do hear some highway traffic if you’re outside, otherwise it was quiet. We enjoyed our stay!
Great place to stay in Sandpoint. Has everything. Great location...and a super comfortable bed!
Amazing stay! Great location!! Thanks.
Great modern space. Very helpful and COMFY bed. Thank you
Beautiful view right on Lake Pend Oreille. Super convenient to downtown, beach, shops & park. Cruiser bikes were fun to ride around town on.

Great location and great hosts. Very nice remodel. Super clean condo, with a lovely porch, complete with rocking chairs so you can have a wonderful spot to capture the morning sun while enjoying your cup of coffee, and contemplating your day’s adventures.
Kara and Taran are great about communicating. It’s been a pleasure to stay in their condo and we appreciate all the work they put in to making this a great experience.
Precious little condo! Clean, well decorated!
A very clean well supplied place with all of the modern conveniences of home. The porch is a great place for visiting and views. Lake access on property and close to bike trails.

Kara and Taran's place was great. Listing on AirBNB accurately depicts the condo. Beautiful and clean. They've thought of everything. We hope to come back in the summer so we can enjoy more of the amentities offered, like the bikes and kayaks.
Great location and excellent accommodations!
We thought this was a great find in Sandpoint. Condo is compact but very comfortable and spotlessly clean. We’d love to come stay here again.
Great condo in a great location. Awesome pad!
I cannot write enough about what an amazing place this is. I actually would like to keep it a secret so I can always come and no one else will know!😉. Best location. Best hosts. Best place.

Loved our stay! Stylish, cozy and so close to downtown! We want to come back during the warmer months so we can utilize the bikes and cruise around downtown. We also want to use the kayaks next time, as well. The bed was comfy, the tv was huge, the fireplace was relaxing.
Bonus points due to their TV being already signed in to a Netflix and Hulu account, for the evenings when things were winding down.
A great place, nice and clean, a short easy walk to downtown.
This by far the BEST place! It is stylish, modern, plus the perfect location. I will stay here again and again!

It is a lovely little condo with wonderful Amenities. We did arrive to no heat and tried for a couple hours to warm the condo with a space heater and a couple wall heaters. We only got it up to 55 degrees. But a call to Kara quickly remedied the problem, since something needed to be reset in the heater. I wish we had called sooner because the condo then heated up very nicely. The modern look and extras are what made this condo a lovely place to stay. The pictures don’t quite show how small the place really is. And there are a couple steps in the condo as you first come in. You have to go up those stairs to access the living room and kitchen. The entrance is a bit crowded by the washing machine and dryer which doesn’t give the best first impression. But the bedroom, bath, living room and kitchen are lovely spaces and well decorated. The condo is well stocked and very clean. One surprise though was having to strip our own linens and towels and start a load of wash. Normally this would not phase me, but we paid a hefty cleaning fee and still had to do this.

Fantastic place to stay. Clean. Easy to get in. The building was difficult to find but when we located the right one everything was fantastic. Clean. Warm. Perfect location near park, bridge and shops. We will stay here again :)

Very clean and comfortable condo with great walking distance location from town and some of the area trails. Condo is set up with everything we needed and more for our weeks stay. Kara and Taran even accommodated a last minute adjustment in the days of our stay! Would rent from them again.
Very responsible and responsive host. Had a nice time. Thank you so much.
Conveniently located, well equipped and cozy. Would certainly stay again!
The condo was clean and cozy. My wife and I enjoyed visiting the restaurants recommended by the hosts. Ending the evening in front of the fireplace was romantic and relaxing.

Super spotless, cozy and quiet condo. Loved the decor!! Parking super easy for unloading luggage. Appreciated the last minute booking. The kitchen was fabulous to cook in with every detail and amenity well thought out. Thanks so much for such a great relaxing and quiet stay. Hope to be back!
Excellent getaway. Very clean and tidy. Everything worked and was easy and functional. Nice big TV, great bedding and towels.
Condo is in a great location, walking distance to town. Condo is clean and super cute!! Loved everything about it. Kara and Taran are great hosts.
We had a great stay, the condo is perfect! Great location and super cute. Would definitely stay again!

This vacation property has been completely renovated and is very clean and beautiful. The location is fantastic, situated right on the waters, and we were within easy walking distance to the shops and restaurants. Great place to stay!
We really enjoyed our stay. Unit is very clean, cozy, and with nice modern amenities. Excellent location, with many restaurants and activities within easy walking distance.

Just an amazing spot! Location is perfect (relative to Sandpoint overall, the lake, and within the complex itself. Pool is just steps from the back porch. The remodel was wonderfully done, and everything is perfect inside. Would highly recommend staying a Kara and Taran's place!

Outstanding condo in beautiful Sandpoint !! Everything perfectly clean and loved the decor which added to our relaxation weekend at the Festival !! Would definitely stay here again and again . PERFECTION 😊

This is an amazing cozy condo with all the special touches. Bikes! Kayaks! A pool right outside the unit. I love the Bluetooth speaker in the bathroom! I rocked out in the shower. So fun.
Having access to Netflix on the tv was another awesome perk. We were tired by days end and it was just the right thing to end the day as a family.
Thank you very much Kara and Taran! We will be back!

What a perfect location. We walked to local bars, restaurants and city Beach. It was fun to use the kayaks and the pool was refreshing! The condo was very clean and comfortable!! The kitchen was stocked with everything we needed to cook!
Close to town and loved exploring on the bikes!
As the previous reviews before coming, the condo was everything we expected. As the key is easy to lose, don’t take it with you every time you leave. Just leave it in the lock box.

The awesome - This condo is great for a couple. Not so much if you have a baby. So if it was just us I would give 5 stars. Super clean, stocked with all you need and the access to the lake and pool are amazing. Quick responses from penny., the host which was helpful. This place is a great great getaway for the romantic couple. The “okay”, which is why I have it 4 stars....The condo does have stairs in the unit so for a crawling baby - no bueno. If the unit was bigger, a flight of stairs would be no problem, but with little space for crawling and hang out, it makes it tough to block it off. I would suggest this host recommended that the unit isn’t really suited for infants / babies. And the upstairs unit is LOUD. Really really loud. You can hear people walking, flushing toilets and showering.... and conversations. To be expected with an older condo building, I totally get it. So again, if it were just us then we can deal. But for sleeping baby. Eh...... all in all, a great space for us, just not is with baby.

This place was lovely! We had such a nice stay! The condo was super clean and well equipped. We are a family of 4 and although it was a little tight in the house- we made it work. We really wanted to be in a lower unit because of the walk out to the grass as we have young kids and it was perfect. It was a lovely space to be in - nice and bright, new renovation, comfortable furniture, great outdoor space and amazing king size bed! We were so comfortable at night! This place is worth the price just for the bed alone! The hosts responded very quickly to any queries and were super accommodating . The washer and dryer worked fabulous! The kitchen was well equipped and such a nice space to be in especially in the morning with the sun! The outdoor deck was amazing- we were out there enjoying it every night for dinner and drinks. The bikes were fabulous! I wish we could of stayed longer. We will definitely miss the convenience of being in that awesome town! Thanks so much for a great stay!
What a beautiful condo to stay in! Super clean and cozy. Fantastic location. Easy walk to town. Had a wonderful pool and view of lake.

Great Spot
The beach cruisers are key to be able to ride a couple blocks into town to eat and or drink and ride back.
Magic!
So beautiful and clean! We really enjoyed our stay, especially the pool and riding the beach cruiser bikes!

If you want to stay in one of the most beautiful condos, with a fantastic location, look no further. Beautifully appointed and clean enough to walk on any floor barefoot, this is one of my new favorites. Communication is excellent, so easy to get in and out. My sister said that she would like to live here forever with the first 3 minutes we were inside. Don't hesitate to book. It was a perfect weekend. Walking in town, kayaking right outside the condo, and a movie night in the most comfy places you'll ever stay!

Great, clean, modern condo centrally located. Very well thought out and equipped !
I will return!

This was a really great experience! They were really great at communicating, and they went above and beyond to be great hosts. I purchased a weekend away for my parents for Mother’s Day, and I can’t say enough wonderful things about the hosts, but here is their review below:
It was the perfect quick little getaway. Everything we needed and more was there. So clean, comfortable and very cozy. A great place to relax and unwind. Location to downtown Sandpoint was perfect. Would like to go back for our 25th Anniversary this summer.
Great place- clean, close to activities, and stylish. The hosts were very helpful and responsive. We would definitely come back!
We loved our stay and hope to be back sometime!!
It was everything thing we expected and more!
Amazing Air Bnb. I’d totally stay here again! Thanks Kara and Taran!

The moment we walked in the door it felt like we were on vacation! Kara and Taran created a little Oasis right in downtown Sandpoint, ( just walking distance to shops and restaurants and a leap away from the water.) The decor is filled with a soft and breezy cottage charm mixed with a modern touch. (I was even awed by the linens... so soft and cozy.) The condo is spotless and everything had its place. It was a peaceful place to wake up to with a view of the mountains and just steps away from the water. With a full kitchen and most importantly a Keurig and coffee provided, I had all I needed. We will be back!
A.G.
Great spot!
A wonderful place in a great location! It was everything we were hoping for!
Very easy drive to Schweitzer for skiing. Save a ton of money on lodging and stay in a nice clean place. Sandpoint is a really nice town. I'd highly recommend this condo.

Kara and Taran were fabulous. They had great recs for our stay in Sandpoint and were quick to respond when needed. The condo is beautiful, the kitchen well equipped, and the bed comfortable. We cannot wait to stay here again in the future!
Attractively renovated condo close to downtown Sandpoint. Great place to stay for skiing Schweitzer. Definitely recommend!
Condo just as pictured. Modern and clean! Perfect location. The hosts were super responsive to questions. We’re coming back here!!!!!!
Great location. Very clean. Had everything you need. Would definitely stay again

It is a clean, stylish, cozy and lovely condo with everything we need for our 2 night stay. Taran and Kara were really professional and easy to communicate. Highly recommended. Would love to come again during the summer time!

A wonderful location, right by the lake, easy walk to downtown and great dining / shopping and for our trip super access to Schweitzer where you are on your boards in 20 minutes from the condo. Beautifully decorated, great amenities. Really a wonderful location and look forward to returning for more great skiing!

What a treasure! Beautifully renovated space with a perfect cooking kitchen and entertaining space ideal for big dinners and cozy movies snuggled up in front of the cute little faux fireplace. Beyond thrilled by the location by the lake and downtown, the perfect space, the wildly comfortable king bed, the gorgeous linens, and the local, stylish decor. Will be booking again!

Taran and Kara’s place was absolutely perfect! There were four of us and it worked out great. The condo is so cozy and it was spotless! I really appreciated how clean and comfortable it was. Also, the location was great and close to everything. I would definitely stay there again!
Best Airbnb experience yet.

This is such a great place..everyone in Sandpoint is extremely welcoming and Kara was no exception! We stayed here over Thanksgiving and the condo was stocked with everything we needed to make lovely meals and great memories. Our hearts are full of gratitude for our time spent here 🖤

Perfect spot! We were greeted with a wonderful welcome of fresh flowers, welcome card and their own brand of smoked salmon! Same as New -Very tastefully remodeled condo, super clean, comfortable king bed with nice linens quality towels, well stocked kitchen, bikes to cruise around town, great location. Thanks Taran and Kara for sharing your home with us!
awesome place to stay! It’s so close to everything and convenient. The decor was great and very comfy living area. Thank you!
Great location on the lake. Ask in advance to make sure bikes & boats are available.
Nice remodel

Loved staying at this chic place. Location was great...we walked to downtown for coffee and lunch. The pictures are spot on and in awe of their remodel and taste! Would definitely recommend this Airbnb to friends and family. Thanks for being such great hosts Taran and Kara.
Perfect spot to relax and chill. The place is modern and comfortable. And Sandpoint is awesome.
We really enjoyed staying at your condo. Everything was perfect, bed, shower, kitchen, washing machine, TV. We did some kayaking in early morning which was awesome. A real gem in our roadtrip.

Nice place, newly remodeled and stylish furnishings.
The upstairs condo was doing construction work (replacing carpet) which made for a noisy stay.
Great place!
Clean and nice Condo, close to downtown.
wonderful condo in a great location. we loved using the bikes to cruise around the downtown area. quiet condo with beautiful decor. perfect for our family with one child.
Great place. Had everything I needed to cook dinners. Very easy to find and close walk to restaurants and downtown. Very clean and well thought out. Will stay again if in the area.

This is a great place for a small family. The location is excellent as we could walk to the beach and the restaurants on 1st Avenue in 10 - 15 minutes (or drive in under 5 minutes). The pool was just off the back deck which made it very easy to go for a quick swim whenever we wanted. We didn't get a chance to use the kayaks or bikes but did enjoy having a tennis court right there. Silverwood Amusement Park/Water Park is only a 30 minute drive. My son and I will definitely stay here again if/when we return to Sandpoint.

Joyful Kindness greeted us at their peaceful condo! We had a wonderful time!
M,M,J,J &bJ :)
Taran and Kara's condo was perfect for our stay. It was nice having use of the kayaks.

Excellent space. Beautifully renovated recently. We enjoyed the amenities such as the pool, bikes, tennis courts and the lake. Location was very close to the public beach and local restaurants and pubs. The owners were extremely kind and accommodating and surprised us with fruit, salmon and a portable air conditioner. There was 4 of us and we fit in the unit just fine.

Recently remodeled, stylish, and well appointed condominium. Kitchen nice and fully stocked. Nice pool, and complex is on the lake with dock for boats. Kayaks and a bike available from owner. Close to downtown. We really enjoyed our stay. Things to consider: It’s a small single bedroom unit. Not a lot of room to spread out so best for a couple. We had our teen daughter and pullout sleeper sofa worked well but takes up most of living area. Being summer we could expand the living space to lovely deck with dining and seating options overlooking pool and view of lake. If it were winter I’d feel a bit confined. Also no air conditioning and while we loved the heat and sun during our stay, the condo gets quite warm. Ceiling fan in bedroom helped greatly but if you’re used to AC be prepared. Sandpoint is great and this was excellent home base to explore. Go to Evans Brothers Coffee on Church Street for your daily caffeine needs. Five minute bike ride away. I think Sweitzer was about a 30 minute (summer) drive. Silverwood water park about 50 minutes.

A fantastic location! Great space in a quiet condo complex right by the lake. The bikes were awesome and made it super easy to get around town. The place was clean and had everything you could need. It is slightly small, we were four people and this place is better for 2 or 3. The only thing that was missing was some storage space in the living room. We had two people sleeping on the pull out couch and they had nowhere to put their stuff other than the bedroom which is kind of awkward. The patio was great, had lovely dinners out there. We did have a few minor issues (spotty internet and a flat bike tire) but Mike was quick to respond and did what he could to help. I would definitely stay again. The renovations they have done to the place are lovely as well.
Nicely renovated, great location. Relaxing stay.

Definitely cozy for a family of 4, but if you're okay with that, it's really perfect. Great location (walking/biking to town), nice remodel and both pool and lakeside. No AC but stayed relatively cool with bedroom fan and cool evenings.

The condo is in a great location on the lake and walking distance to town. The condo was nicely remodeled and we appreciated use of the kayaks. The complex was very quiet and the people we did run into were very friendly. This was our first trip to Sandpoint and would visit again.

Everything as described and more! Great location at Condo del Sol but with upgraded features, all new everything! We had a family of 4 stay here easy and the very large TV with netflix and more made winding down for the kids a breeze. Communcation was great and the condo had eveything needed. Pool is right off the comfortable back patio and even lake views. As many of the condo's in the area and as described in the ad there is no A/C in unit, so if you have a summer stay you may want to bring a fan as the main living are is warmed quickly with morning sun! Great stay, will be on the radar for all of our future sandpoint trips.

This place is just lovely! The view of the water and hills is gorgeous, and the pool is a rare, amazing amenity for the area. If you like to run, walk or bike, this place is perfectly located just steps from the lakefront path to the bridge, and a 5 mins walk to the city beach and park. Not only was the condo sparkling clean, it was also modern and functional. We would absolutely stay again and again. 10 stars!

Really great and stylish condo lakeside in Sandpoint. Awesome location on the water, comfortable bedroom, gorgeous fireplace and huge TV with Netflix and sports/all the channels, in case of rain :) Great pool right off the patio. We had a great time!
What a great place to stay. Easy walk to downtown, yet very quiet and peaceful at night.

Lovely apartment, easily walkable to everything we wanted to do, see, eat, and drink in Sandpoint. There is a very bright streetlight outside the bedroom window that the blackout curtains don't quite contain so if you are sensitive to light while sleeping I recommend a sleep mask. Apartment was very, very clean, well organized, comfortable, and relaxing.
We loved our stay! Perfect for what we were looking for and would absolutely stay again.
Our stay was amazing. Very cozy and accommodating spot. The hot tub was a nice touch and we were a walk away from the center of town. Thank you so much for having us! Would stay again.
This place was awesome! Great location and perfect for our needs. This is a must for your stay in Sandpoint!

Very nice place within walking distance to downtown restaurants and entertainment. Inside of home was tastefully decorated and all included amenities were modern and functioning. Would definitely stay here again!
Great place to stay! Loved the hot tub, 10 min walk to most things downtown.
Very comfortable stay, great location, walkable to downtown area, and short drive to Schweitzer resort.

This was our seconded stay and would love to return over and over!! So much privacy, great location and super responsive host!
The decor is fabulous!! Thank you!! Perfect stay!

This place is a real gem. From the outside you would think of a rustic setting but that vanishes when you look at the inside. It’s modern and is as quaint and welcoming as can be and the hot tub is fantastic. I used it as a base for skiing Schweitzer and it was ideal for that. Restaurants and grocery were in walking distance. I would stay here again in a minute!
Perfect place to stay in Sandpoint. Walk to everything. 20 min to the ski mountain.

Cannot speak highly enough of Joey and his Garage Getaway. From the start Joey was very responsive and accommodating. The space itself is so cute and homey. We want to model our ADU after it! If you’re staying in Sandpoint, look no further. Everywhere you want to be is within a 5 min drive/10 minute walk.
This place was great! Clean, had the amenities we needed and was walkable to downtown!
Beautiful home with the heart of downtown within walking distance
Amazing!! Wonderful and clean stay! Great communication, would recommend to anyone staying in the area.
Would highly recommend
Awesome spot, would love to come back and highly recommend!

Great space for a weekend getaway! Conveniently located near a coffee shop and an easy walk to town. The host had thought of everything from hot tub robes and towels to coffee and tea. They also provided an awesome list of recommended spots to check out in town. Would highly recommend!
Lovely place :)
Joeys place is really lovely. Nice quality furnishings and linens. Extremely clean. Very close to downtown Sandpoint. We will definitely be staying there again.

My husband and I enjoyed our weekend getaway at Joey's place. He was very communicative, provided detailed instructions in advance, and the space was beautifully decorated and welcoming. Parking on the street next to the getaway was easy and felt safe, considering we could see the car from the bedroom window. Unfortunately it was a bit too rainy for us to walk the neighborhood or make use of the hot tub, but we had a lovely time reading next to the fireplace and playing a few of the provided games in the living room. Our stay was comfortable, easy, and quiet - exactly what we needed for a few days away from home.

We LOVED it. Joey's place was the perfect spot for me and my now husband. My parents and family live in Sandpoint, so we rented Joey's place for a few days to visit with family before we headed to Coeur d'Alene for our wedding weekend. It was the perfect apartment for us.
Joey was proactive with communication and extremely responsive. There was a little welcome note and snack basket waiting for us and the home was big enough for us to have my parents and sister over for dinner but also felt cozy and homey for the two of us. I really appreciated the countertop space and bathroom size too. A lot of the homes in Sandpoint are a little older so the bathrooms always have limited countertop space, the showers can be tiny and the bathrooms are just smaller overall. But that wasn't the case with Joey's, it was the perfect amount! We 100% want to stay here again when we come back to visit our family in the future!
What a great airbnb experience! We arrived to a lovely welcome card and chocolates. The unit was really beautiful and well-appointed. Such cute decorations and super clean!
I would definitely stay there again!
Amazing place and host, best Airbnb I’ve stayed in by far!
Wow, what a gem of a place! The apartment was just perfect and Joey and company were great hosts. Well stocked, very cute, and plenty of space. We would definitely stay here again!

We felt right at home at Joey's place. The design and decor were great and all the amenities were very comfortable. My kids loved playing all the games and we read all the books. The sheets were luxurious and the mattresses were great. We walked to many places, which we loved, including great coffee shops, a park, the library and the beach. Joey was very responsive, friendly and helpful! We'll definitely try to stay again here. Highly recommend!

This was an absolutely fabulous place to stay! The decor was gorgeous! It was spotless, modern and had every amenity we could have possibly needed. This was the perfect place to stay for our time at Silverwood. The hot tub was such a nice perk as we were super sore from all the rides. Joey was very responsive. We even ate all the great variety of goodies they had out for us! Wonderful experience all around!!
Very comfortable and cozy place with everything we needed and more
Everything went great with our stay at Joeys place and also with our communication and check in. I wouldn't hesitate to stay again.
Great location for visiting Sandpoint. Nice clean place and nice responsive host. Would recommend.

We were in town for the Long Bridge swim. This was the perfect location for our family of 4 - close enough to town to walk in, set in a walkable neighborhood with old trees. Very close to a shopping center but surprisingly this didn’t add any noise to the serene environment. As others have said, this Airbnb exceeds all expectations. The attention to detail is superb. Our kids slept on the pull out couch and I noticed its mattress was exceptionally comfortable. We enjoyed the hot tub as well. It’s a small space but very thoughtfully laid out. Highly recommend!
Joey and co-hosts were absolutely amazing ! The bed was comfy ! The was clean ! Hot tub was fantastic!

We loved our stay! Perfect for our little family and easy to get to. It was also close to local amenities and stores. They had tons of extras like beach towels and beach chairs that really added to our stay, and I loved the local coffee selection as well as the complimentary snacks/drinks offered! Host was great and responsive as well!! If we end up needing a place to stay in sandpoint again we will be here again if at all possible!

Joey was very responsive and flexible with early check in. The apartment was beautifully decorated with thoughtful touches and we felt right at home. Great location and walkable to town. Really enjoyed our stay!
We enjoyed our stay, Joeys place was very clean and comfortable

We were very happy at the “Garage Getaway”. Beautifully furnished and very comfortable. The kitchen had everything you would need to prepare and enjoy meals. Would definitely recommend it and would return.

This is a fantastic airBnB with plenty of thoughtful little amenities. Love how walkable the location is and having access to the bikes. The space stayed cool even in the sweltering heat. Highly recommend!

Garage getaway was a great spot for a little mini honeymoon for us! Joey was responsive and accommodating! He even offered us early check in for our stay. The accommodations were exactly as pictured and the location was fantastic for us. We loved having the kitchen available for making our own meals and it was stocked with everything we needed. The details included were also such a nice touch, including local coffee, and a nice welcome note and treats! Thanks again for having us Joey! We will definitely recommend your spot to anyone we know looking to visit Sandpoint! And will definitely book again if we are to be back ourselves :)

This is a one-bedroom apartment, beautifully decorated, in the perfect location. For me, the mark of the perfect accommodations is in the details and this place has them! The host provides local coffee beans, along with a grinder, a pour over, and an electric kettle. I’m such a coffee snob that I travel with my own coffee, pour over and kettle, but I didn’t need it here! The coffee was delicious. There are hooks on the wall and what accommodations don’t need more hooks on the wall. Excellent detail!
The place is walking distance to downtown.
Sometimes, AirBnBs have cute pictures and decor but are NOT comfortable. This was both! If you’re coming to Sandpoint, stay here!
This place was amazing and was very well thought out. It was walking distance to everything! There is so much to do in the Sandpoint area. I highly recommend it.
We had a wonderful stay, everything we needed was there! We LOVED having use of the bicycles to get around Sandpoint, that was great fun! Thank you!

Really cute and quiet - easy walk to downtown venues and restaurants! Nice touches everywhere - high quality everything. Great linens and towels. Kitchen had everything and nice little snacks and welcome. Bed was too firm for us - a topper would have been nice.

Our new favorite Airbnb, the place was SPOTLESS, couldn’t find a spec of dust if you tried. The door was easy access and location was perfect, right between everything you need. Our favorite part was the beach cruisers we used all weekend, everywhere we went. We also appreciated the snacks and waters in the fridge which is something we haven’t ever had in an Airbnb before. The bed was extremely comfortable and the place truly felt like home, we can’t wait to go back. Our favorite spot to eat in the area was hydrasteak house, does not disappoint!!!

We definitely rate the Garage Getaway as 5 star. The outside may seem a little nonchalant, but the inside is top notch. Very clean, beautiful décor, and comfy everywhere. Close enough to downtown where we walked there several times. The neighborhood with its elegant picturesque homes was perfect for my husband’s daily walks. He swore he saw a 39 lb. cat and 17 lb. squirrels. It was a beautiful weekend weather wise and the Garage Getaway was the perfect place to stay.
Joey's place was the perfect stop for our trip to Schweitzer. It was beautifully laid out and comfortable.

We absolutely LOVED our time here!! Very cozy, lean, and comfortable. It’s the little things that really make a difference… amazing coffee, treats and chocolates, welcome card. As well as the important things - clean, comfortable bed, nice towels. The hot tub was a real treat after skiing. We will absolutely come back and stay here next time we visit Sandpoint! Highly recommend - also great location - easily walk around town
This place was great, everything we needed and wanted. Well laid out and appointed. Would definitely stay here again.
Very clean, very cozy and lots thought put into layout and comforts.

If you’re looking for a comfortable place to stay in Sandpoint that’s walkable to downtown shopping and restaurants this is it! The Garage Getaway was perfectly appointed and had everything we needed. The hot tub was an added bonus after a day of skiiing. Highly recommend!
Such a gorgeous cozy clean space with so much to offer. This is now our Sandpoint spot and am very excited about it. Bravo hosts!

Fantastic location; shops, restaurants, grocery all within walking distance and a short drive to skiing. Also great amenities; fluffy towels, a heated fan in the bathroom (!), and even a crockpot. Easiest check-in we've experienced. Thanks for sharing this amazing space.

Top notch host. This is one of the best Airbnb’s we’ve stayed at and one of the few I’d come back to. The place was perfect right down to the small personal touches. And so comfortable! Plush towels, great pillows and the carpet in the bedroom is so nice to walk on. We had a great stay and Joey is an excellent host. 10/10

This Airbnb is perfectly located within walking distance to all the shops/restaurants in downtown Sandpoint. It was extremely clean and well stocked with all the necessities and more! A short 20-25 minute drive to Schweitzer as well. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our extended weekend in the Garage Getaway. Joey was a wonderful host and was very communicative from start to finish. **An added bonus was the mom and baby Moose roaming outside one morning. Wouldn’t hesitate booking this place again! Thanks for the great stay!
Perfect home for a ski weekend at Shweitzer. Highly recommended.

Joey's property is top shelf! Highly recommended if you're in the Sandpoint area. Very clean, great furnishings, nicely appointed, and a well-stocked kitchen with everything necessary for cooking meals at home. This was our second stay and it was just what we expected - excellent. We will be back. Thanks for a great stay!

The place was very clean, cozy and well-appointed. Perfect for a winter getaway to Schweitzer, but I think it would be just as nice in the summer since it's really walkable - restaurants, grocery store, coffee shops etc. Welcome snacks were very welcomed by our 10-year-old. The coffee set-up (local beans) was much nicer than most AirBnBs. Hot tub was enjoyable and worth the trek in the cold.
Perfect location for skiing at Schweitzer and exploring Sandpoint! The hot tub was a huge plus after a long day on the mountain. Hope to stay here again sometime!

Joey’s Garage Getaway is a clean, comfortable and conveniently located property in the middle of Sandpoint. It has a well designed floor plan.
It is the perfect size for two adults as a one bedroom. You are within walking distance of all of Sandpoint attractions, restaurants and shops.
Joey, our host, was friendly, quick to respond and went above and beyond for all of our needs and questions.
We asked if he had a humidifier for the property. We told him it was not a big deal if he did not. He promptly responded that he did and would place it outside of our door within 15 minutes. Joey delivered a brand new, top of the line, personal humidifier at our doorstep.
We parked our car on the street during a snow storm. The plow came by and plowed us in. As we were shoveling our car out, Joey came by, grabbed a shovel and helped us free our car.
This property and Joey are great for visitors to the Sandpoint community. He was our favorite host. We will be back.
Great location, responsive hosts, cleanliness could be improved.
Great, clean, comfy stay close to activity down town!

The Garage Getaway may just be my fave Airbnb yet! My husband and I took a last minute trip to Sandpoint and Joey’s place was just absolutely perfect. The comfiest bed, super clean + we soooo loved the hot tub! We didn’t want to leave!!!!
The Garage Getaway is a perfect little place in the heart of Sandpoint. We loved all the wonderful details and would go back in a heartbeat.
Comfy, quiet, and sooo close to downtown! Joey was super communicative and checking in was a breeze. Will definitely stay again, hopefully during ski season!
The Garage Getaway was the perfect location for our little family. Every detail was thought of and we felt right at home.
Great stay! Comfortable, cute and clean.
Great place to stay! Close to everything and very clean. Highly recommend Joey’s place, Thank you!

Joey's apartment is perfect. Neat, clean, thoughtfully designed, little touches of hospitality throughout. My husband and I were visiting Idaho from Virginia to receive medical treatment from a Doctor in CDA, and chose to stay in Sandpoint to be away from the hustle and bustle of the larger city. CDA was an effortless (and pretty) 40 minute commute to our appointments throughout the week and coming back to Joey's apartment each day was a retreat. The apartment is located on a very quiet street, yet walking distance to everything downtown Sandpoint has to offer - especially two grocery stores! The very private hot tub was such a relaxing treat; what better way to start the cool mornings relaxing in the hot tub with a cup of Evans Bros. Coffee Joey so graciously provides? Perfection! The balcony off the bedroom was wonderful for an afternoon cocktail or two. Everything about the apartment was so comfortable and welcoming! For those mornings we didn't feel like making breakfast, we loved Connie's Cafe - every meal delicious! We would not hesitate to stay at Joey's Garage Apartment again - highly recommended! Thank you, Joey; job well done. 👏
Joey made the weekend so special for my parents’ anniversary! They were so pleased with the apartment and its location!

If this place is available - stay here! It’s pretty spectacular with such attention to detail. Beautifully furnished with everything you can think of! We had an incredible time in Sandpoint and staying here just made it even better.
We will definitely be back!

This was by far the best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in. It was so comfortable and clean. There were so many thoughtful touches that made it feel like home. The location was great. Close to downtown & the lake. I appreciated the coffee bar and extras to make my morning coffee. My husband really enjoyed the hot tub. We would definitely recommend staying here & hope to be back soon!
This place was the best! Everything you'd need on a stay away from home! Way better than staying in a hotel. We'll definitely be coming back!
We very much enjoyed out stay. The apt. is ideal and super cute. All the extras (coffee bean choices, welcome basket) were a lovely touch.

We had such a great stay! The location was central to everything, a quick 2 block walk to Safeway to grab groceries to cook in the kitchen, and even a lovely walk to Memorial Field where we got to experience the Festival at Sandpoint! There is also a brewery, wine tasting room, and hatchet throwing within blocks. The apartment is beautifully decorated, and Joey's communication was beyond stellar! Will definitely stay again! Thank you!
Was a wonderful place to stay in downtown Sandpoint. Very clean and comfortable. The location made things easy to walk to everything. Would come back again in the future!
Great place, clean, well stocked, perfect location. We had such a nice stay.

Amazing, clean, and modern space. Hot tub and bikes, plus other fun, complimentary lake things made the experience that much better. A few blocks from Sandpoint’s staples: The Hydra steakhouse and the farmers market. And the city beach just a few more.
Loved it, hope to stay for our Schweitzer trip.

Staying at Joey’s was great for a long weekend. The unit was clean, cozy, and in a really great location to access all the fun restaurants and activities in downtown Sandpoint. Joey was very easy to communicate with.
Our family looks forward to staying there again!
Joey’s place was awesome! Great communicator, brand new everything, modern decor-very upscale feel. We are picky super hosts and Joey’s place is a 10 out of 10! Highly recommend to other guests!

Joey’s apartment was amazing for our two night stay in Sandpoint! It had everything we needed and is in a fantastic location close to a grocery store and walkable to the beach park. Joey was communicative throughout our stay and even let us know the place was ready and that we could check in early if we wanted. He has pretty much everything you need for your stay in this fun little town! Thanks Joey!

One of our very favorite airbnbs ever! Joey is a really wonderful host who communicates very well. The apartment is located close enough to downtown that we could easily walk everywhere we wanted to go. Very comfortable and clean. We loved it!

The garage get away did not disappoint! Very well appointed and centrally located. We walked to dinner every night. It's also close to a beach and Joey provides a couple of breach chairs and towels to take advantage of the close proximity. The attention to details was also greatly appreciated.
We really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is very clean, well equipped and well situated in town. Joey and cohosts were very responsive throughout our stay.

Everything was just perfect! Clean, comfortable, easy, close to everything, and stylish! We had the chance to use the bikes and had a great time riding around town! Looking forward to coming back again soon!

This was a perfect getaway for me, my husband and our 4 year old. Elegant
& modern decor that was comfortable with nice touches. Clean and surprisingly spacious for a 1 bedroom. The little extras that included snacks, local coffee beans and a welcome note were lovely. We didn't get to try out the hot tub but it was nice knowing it was available.
Communication was great and our week overall a great experience.

Joey really gives a lot of attention to the details and made this place feel like home. The apartment was beautiful and so inviting! I loved the pour over coffee and fresh whole coffee beans from the local coffee shop. The bath products were great and free of all the nasty harsh chemicals and smells. Everything was clean and the hot tub was very relaxing! This is a great location and an excellent host!

Great place in a great location The place was exactly the way it was described. We really enjoyed our stay. We had everything we needed and our hosts were quick to respond if we reached out to them. We’d love to go back again.
Joey is a pro! Beautiful location, lovely hot tub, all the comforts of home. 5/5 would recommend!!!

So many others have said it, this is THE BEST Airbnb we've ever stayed at. Comfortable beds, super clean home, well stocked with goodies and coffee, immaculate set up, and very thoughtfully designed. As a person who doesn't love super strong fake fragrances I also appreciated the scent free laundry detergent and the fact that there is not an overwhelming aroma to the place- you know how some Airbnb's try and be so 'fresh and clean' smelling and it's just fake fragrances- not Joey's! His place smells clean because it is SO clean. Very walkable to everything downtown, the bike path is close by, and the lake shore is just short walk from the spot. Super private and quiet as well. We loved Sandpoint!
A perfect location to explore the beautiful town of Sandpoint from! A home-away-from-home that you won’t regret booking.
Great place with an accommodating host! Lots to do at the AirBNB and close around town!

Just a delightful space. Thoughtful touches, everything was clean and updated. And the kitchen was one the most well-stocked with utensils and appliances I’ve ever seen. Great private hot tub, a short walk to plenty of activities: this place is perfect!

My husband and I booked this space for a low key weekend out of town. The space was perfect for the two of us and had everything we needed. We were able to cook a full meal one night and the location is very walkable.
Everything about this place is perfect!

Perfect stay in Sandpoint!
This Garage Getaway was an ideal setting with every detail thoughtfully considered. New construction, furnishings, art and hot tub make this one an easy recommendation. The bed was comfy, snacks were delicious and coffee/tea bar a true treat. We'll be back!

Joey's place is beautifully styled, very comfortable, conveniently located... so perfect for a Sandpoint stay. His generous and thoughtful touches - chocolates on the bed - made it feel 7 star hotel quality. My sore body enjoyed the hot tub and cozy beds. The kitchen was great to cook in and the TV & fireplace to relax by. I strongly recommend and would easily visit again.

Thanks so much, Joey! Your place was awesome!
Our only complaint was someone going in and out of the garage most of the afternoon on Saturday, clanging around, and extra noise. We didn't use the hottub as we didn't realize you had to go out and around through the front along the street. So, maybe if that's better disclosed? We only had brought boots and didn't have shoes to wear or a swim coverup. So, rather disappointed.
But, everything else was great!

Joey’s place is in a convenient location within walking distance to town and a short drive to Schweitzer mountain. We enjoyed the hot tub and amenities provided by Joey and we would love to come back!
I would definitely stay again. It was lovely inside.

This was our favorite AirBnB ever; and we stay at quite a few AirBnBs! The location was very convenient to grocery stores, downtown, hiking, skiing, etc. The bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, and living/dining area were very spacious. The furnishings were all high end, and the artwork was very tasteful. I love to cook, and found that the kitchen had everything I needed. The knives were sharp, and the refrigerator was clean and free from leftover food from other renters. (I hate dull knives and other people's food.) I appreciated that the door-entry code was customized for our stay, so we knew nobody else would have access. Joey responded immediately to the few questions I had before our stay. He provided coffee beans, tea bags, seltzer, and welcome snacks, which was a nice "extra." And the hot tub was perfect for after skiing! We sill definitely plan to stay here whenever we visit Sandpoint.
Great spot near downtown Sandpoint and Schweitzer! Super clean and well stocked. Hot tub area nice and private.
This place is stylish, clean, modern and conveniently located. It was great for exploring Sandpoint on foot and close to Schweitzer for skiing. We will definitely return.

This Airbnb was perfect for our weekend stay in Sandpoint! Central location, easy to access, the space was not too small, very clean and well thought out. The host was responsive and helpful. The hot tub was an awesome bonus!! We loved it!
Super clean. Great hot tub!
Amazing stay in Sandpoint! The location is great. Joeys place is cute, cozy, and so clean. We will definitely come back! Thanks Joey!

Very comfortable, well-appointed and excellent location for shopping, dining and outdoor pursuits! Joey is super responsive, communication was quick and easy and check in / out was a breeze. Highly recommend!
Thank you Joey for providing such a thoughtful experience for us this weekend. Truly enjoyed all the little details in your apartment.

A fantastic rental!! My husband and I stayed for a week and it was perfect. Very well stocked, hot tub was great, and comfortable bed! We absolutely loved if and would stay again! It’s about a 25 min drive to Schweitzer :)
Awesome location! Joey was wonderful to communicate with - we will be back and stay again!!
Great place, immaculately clean.
Private hot tub is a plus and a nice spot. Highly recommend

The Garage Getaway is a gem! It served as the perfect weekend getaway for my husband and I. We appreciate how thought out and organized the space was. We loved the attention to detail- from the welcome card and little treats to the local coffee and beautiful decor. The space was beautiful and incredibly comfortable. It helped us ease into our vacation and feel at home. Joey truly thought of everything! Also, the private hot tub saved the day after a long day at the mountain! The Garage Getaway was exactly what we were looking for and we will definitely be back!

What a great Airbnb! This place is perfect for your trip to Sandpoint. We chose this location because it was close to Schweitzer and it did not disappoint. Perfectly appointed, very clean, great host, great communication. Highly recommend this Airbnb. Five stars!
Great place! Walking distance to everything downtown. The apartment getaway itself was perfect and comfortable for a nice stay! We will definitely be back for another getaway

The space is beautiful, well located, and had everything we needed for our stay. The snacks and local coffee were a nice touch, and after a day of skiing, the hot tub was perfect! Joey was super accommodating, and quick to respond. We will definitely stay here again.
Everything was very nice and clean. The apartment is quiet, private and spacious. We'll stay here again.
This place was great! Really thoughtful accommodations.

Joey’s garage getaway was heaven for our couple of days away!! It’s such a beautiful newly renovated apartment over the garage, 2 blocks from downtown Sandpoint and across the street from a grocery store. Joey has made a beautiful space with every amenity you could ever need. He went above and beyond to give us local recommendations for a wonderful thanksgiving dinner and his favorite local spots to eat. The jacuzzi was so nice to have as an added amenity and the kitchen was fully stocked with anything you might need to cook. The little details make the value absolutely worth it and his communication and directions for our stay were timely and clear! We will be back!! I cannot give enough praise to this little slice of heaven in Sandpoint, ID.

Wonderful apt in the heart of Sandpoint. Very clean and gorgeous inside.
Joey was awesome, communicated very well and made our 20 year anniversary memorable.
Highly recommend.

Our stay was great. Joeys place was just as described. Very clean. Great location, and Joey was an amazing host. Quick to respond, and accommodating to any of my needs. Would highly recommend staying here.

5 starts plus another 5! Joey went above and beyond all of our expectations before we even arrived. The atmosphere was wonderful, the apartment had everything we needed and is in walking distance of everything we needed- and the hot tub such an awesome addition! Anything we needed was quickly taken care of. I would highly recommend staying at Joey’s!
This place is fantastic. It was clean, up to date, within walking distance (10 minutes) to downtown eateries, shops and such. I would definitely go back when in the area.

Super cute and comfortable place. Every detail was done with a thought. Close to everything. Joey went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable. We could not have asked for more. Staying at Joey's made our entire stay in Sandpoint so much more enjoyable!
Great place to stay! Clean, beautifully decorated and very close to downtown.

We really enjoyed our stay!! Very comfortable and well stocked, clean unit. Check in was easy and communication with Joey was great. If you happen to have feather allergies, perhaps let Joey know ahead of time as there were a good amount in the bedroom, however we were happy to see extra pillows and blankets we could use and had no issues. We will definitely stay again if we are back in Sandpoint! 😀

What a great little apartment! We stayed 2 nights and it was really evident that Joey has put a lot of thought into making his guests’ stay comfortable and has gone above and beyond with a variety of small details to make their stay special. The bedding and furniture were all clean and comfortable, there was a great variety of cooking essentials if desired and a wonderful “coffee bar” with locally roasted beans. Thanks for a wonderful start to our week of vacation.
This was one of the best airbnb's we have stayed. Great location, clean space and the communication was great.

Fantastic place!! Great location, within walking distance of town and the beach. Clean to perfection! So enjoyable to show up and have everything sparkling! Snacks on the table for when you wake with the munchies or show up tired and hungry. All items were top quality for a touch of luxury! Thanks for a perfect weekend!

Great experience, great host! Joey was quick with communication and was responsive leading up to and during our stay. The place was secure, clean and comfortable with all the amenities we needed! Parking was easy, and it was close to everything. Thank you!

Joey's Garage GetAway exceeded our expectations. It was immaculately clean, wonderfully designed, had all the amenities--and some. He provided fabulous coffee, and treats. He even met us at the property to make sure we felt welcome. What a fabulous stay and a one of a kind host. Thank you Joey for making our trip memorable.

Joey’s apartment is really great! Super clean and well appointed. Super comfortable and quiet. Just a few minutes walk to the best of sandpoint : restaurants/ brewpubs/ the lake and beach/ markets/ bars/ parks. Joey is a great host and if you’re coming to sandpoint, you’ll be really comfortable here . He’s super responsive and wants you to be comfy.

well designed, located, and comfortable 1 bedroom in a great location! we couldn't explore much with the wildfire smoke at the time of our visit, but enjoyed a cozy day in with a/c and movies. very comfortable for our family of 4!
So glad to have found this spot! It was a perfect little place to set up home base for a few days.

I had a very relaxing and comfortable stay at the "Garage Getaway" in Sandpoint. I would like to say the name is a bit misleading; I was expecting a shabby, low ceiling, dingy garage apartment. The hosts were very responsive and accommodating. This is a really nice place, and hopefully, I can stay here again in the future. I would come back for certain.

This is one of the nicest rentals we have stayed at. The kitchen was well stocked, the bed is comfy and there were lots of extras in bathroom to make our stay very comfortable. The location is perfect and you can walk just about anywhere you want to be. Sandpoint t is beautiful, with so much to do outdoors. You won’t be disappointed in your stay at Joeys. We hope to be back again soon!

The most adorable, well stocked, comfortable, perfectly located home! Joey allowed us to check in early and continued to stay in touch for whatever we needed. He gave great recommendations too. I can’t say enough good things!!

We stayed at Garage Getaway for a month in July. It felt like we were in a hotel suite with our own concierge! Joey was awesome with communication and getting a few things we requested to enhance our stay. The place is well equipped: beach chairs, towels, bikes etc as well as any kitchen item you could ever need. I miss his super sharp knives and brand new gas range! Would absolutely stay again and recommend you do the same.

You can expect a lovely stay. The apartment is very thoughtfully decorated and easy to walk to downtown to have dinner or for an evening stroll by the water. Joey is a great host and you can tell he enjoys it.
Book this one!

When entering this apartment above the garage we were stunned at how beautiful, well furnished and relaxing it felt. Joey raised the bar with this AirBnB. The layout and design of the apartment has many windows (very new shades on all the windows) in the open-concept living area giving the space light and a welcoming feeling. There is more to add, but let your own experience here delight you. This is a great home away from home. We loved the place, one of the best ones we've stayed at, nationally and internationally. Thanks so much.

Joey’s place is fantastic! I could tell the minute we opened the door and started to walk up the stairs that it was going to be clean. There was a delightful scent right away. And sure enough. I loved the personal touch of a hand written note and chocolate! Everything is within walking distance. It’s all around a wonderful place. We highly recommend!
Joey's Garage Getaway is absolutely wonderful! Every possible detail is taken care of with supreme comfort in mind. Best equipped kitchen ever! I can't wait to come back!!

This apartment is well situated downtown with in walking distance to many of the Sandpoint restaurants and bars. The unit was extremely clean and well appointed with everything you could need. It was so great to have a washer and dryer and full kitchen. We will be back!
Our third stay in as many months and we’re still in love with this place.
Location, amenities, and quality are hard to beat!

What a great place to stay! The apartment was extremely clean with so many thoughtful amenities! The location is within walking distance of downtown and the hosts went above and beyond to make sure we had everything that we needed!

I LOVED this place! Great location - walkable to all of the fun and beautiful things Sandpoint has to offer. Great space - everything was so well-designed, comfortable, and clean. Great amenities - I think the kitchen is stoked better than my own at home (ha!), and all of the snacks and thoughtful “extras” were so wonderful. I hope to book this place again someday soon.
Our second visit at Joey's place was just as great as our first. Can't wait to come back.
Great spot to stay!

It is truly the perfect location to relax and enjoy Sandpoint. In walking distance to most everything, and all the beautiful touches throughout the place made us feel so welcomed! Fantastic hosts and we look forward to coming back soon!
We loved our stay at the Garage Getaway! The place was so well decorated and we felt at home. Everything was so clean and new, it truly was a beautiful space! We will definitely be back!
Amazing find. Charming, wonderfully decorated, pristine and walking distance to all the great dining and shops in downtown. Hope we’ll be back soon so we can stay here again.

Joey’s place was perfect, absolutely perfect. From the high end finishes to the quick responses to the extra attention to detail to the amenities, this place was a dream. We cannot speak highly enough about this wonderful place. The location was quiet and easy to get everywhere. We are looking forward to our next visit.

Joeys Garage Getaway was an amazing space for my family and I. It was so clean, cozy and spacious. It was a short walk to downtown and the grocery store and we didn’t need to drive anywhere. We will be back to stay again!
Great stay in Sandpoint. Nicely decorated/furnished, sparkling clean and special hospitality touches with snacks, waters and La Croix in the fridge. Short walk into downtown Sandpoint.

This is the nicest ABB I’ve ever stayed in. Great location, super clean and great stylish touches. Every amenity you can think of. Nice personal extras. We needed to use the laundry quite a bit due to some moving activities and it was a really nice setup. Outstanding value.
Joe is above and beyond the perfect host. The space is so perfect and quality is incredible. He is so thoughtful with the same local touches and really cares about the quality of your stay.

We loved the treehouse, it was such a unique and
Beautiful place. We felt very welcomed and really enjoyed our peaceful visit. Witnessing the moose and eagles in the same day was surreal.

What a special get away. Thank you Jon and Becky for being so accommodating and welcoming us to the property. We got a surprise rainstorm and it was such a treat. Treehouse held up perfectly and the pitter patter of the rain was the perfect soundtrack to our elevated view of the surrounding nature.

Had another lovely stay at the Treehouse! It was beautiful as ever, and Jon & Becky were, once again, wonderful hosts. We enjoyed our weekend and had everything we needed and more. We hope to be back again sometime!
We thank Jon and Becky for a great experience, and beautiful property.

Jon and Becky: A Caring Host and Hostess.
Some of the details were reminiscent of what you might encounter from family. Small bouquets of flowers from the garden, a dreamy bed, fresh local coffee, Becky's home made bread with butter and jam. With out a doubt the tree house is a structure that was built with feeling and artistry. The whole experience was inspiring.
In Gratitude,

What a nice change of pace!! Very well maintained space for 2 with all the necessities. Obviously you have stairs to climb so be prepared for that with luggage etc, but was well worth it!! The views are incredible! We also had access to the dock for swimming, sunning, or taking out the kayaks & stand up paddle boards. Jon and his family were very welcoming and hospitable. Would return again!

Fantastic place, exactly as advertised. Quaint little tree house on a beautiful lake…but the treehouse is anything but quaint. It will blow you away! Use of canoes and kayaks, cute downtown a couple miles away and plenty of hiking, swimming and boating. Perfect place for someone who wants something other than your standard hotel room! Would stay again!
We absolutely loved our stay here! The treehouse was so was fun, unique, and cozy, and the area is just beautiful. The hosts were also so friendly and welcoming. We’d absolutely stay here again!

Jon and Becky's treehouse is a very special place! They were welcoming, the views are incredible, the whole property is beautifully kept, and the yummy homemade jam and bread were a lovely, and tasty, touch.

This treehouse is exactly as you see! Beautiful inside and out. The hosts are kind, welcoming and give it a great personal touch. It's just a quick drive into town (also a bike/running path that we used!) to her any groceries or go out to eat and shop. We spent most the time on the dock or out in the water. Highly recommend!
Unique Treehouse with an amazing view. Great location for a relaxing weekend by the lake.

This treehouse is seriously one of the coolest places you’ll ever stay! We had a truly magical weekend here. The bed was so comfortable, the views were breathtaking, we had our own private dock that they had lounge chairs set up on for us and we brought some floaties that we tied up to the dock and had the best day on the water. A perfect place for a romantic getaway. I’m already wanting to plan a trip to return for even longer next time. Do not miss out on this awesome spot!!
We loved our stay at the treehouse SO much! We brought our bikes and rode into downtown Sandpoint. Enjoyed coffee on the deck, and took in the incredible views! Such.a relaxing stay, memorable stay!

The pictures don’t reflect how special this setting is. You are right on the lake with eagles soaring above and a cool breeze to help you sleep like a baby. Jon and Becky shared their swim dock and kayaks so we could get out in the lake. The property is gorgeous. Becky provided fresh cherries from their tree along with lots of other personal touches. A truly magical place.

What a beautiful and fun place to stay! We thoroughly enjoyed our time at the Treehouse and appreciated all of the thoughtful details and personal touches. Would love to stay here again soon and highly recommend it!
So happy with our stay! Even better than the photos! We already want to go back!
Delightful little vacation spot! Loved it!
Great place, fun treehouse right at the water.

Thank you for a WONDERFUL getaway

What a fantastic place for a get away. We loved the tree house along with the amazing views! So peaceful and quiet. We will definitely be back. Very clean also and inside is as enjoyable as the outside. Hosts were very friendly and welcoming.
Relaxing

Amazing escape! The pictures almost don’t do the treehouse justice. And Becky and Jon’s attention to detail is incredible.
