Unique, peaceful, amazing views! We loved our stay at the tree house. The hosts are wonderful, the treehouse is cozy and the attention to detail was appreciated.
Will definitely be back again.

We had a great and relaxing stay at the treehouse! Check in was easy and there were so many thoughtful touches, like fresh flowers in every room. We loved spending time on the lake, but also never grew tired of being indoors and looking out the windows! Highly recommend for others looking for a peaceful lake retreat.

The cozy treehouse is breathtaking with an incredible view! We enjoyed our stay and would love to come back for a second time, but this time with our bikes, and summer weather. Jon and Becky are sweet people. They seem like a lot of fun and they give you fun things to do around their property like fishing, kayaking, and they even have a pickleball court. So cool! By far our favorite little getaway to relax and find peace again.
Celeste and Nick (North Bend, WA)

One of a kind experience! So very grateful to Jon and Becky for allowing the opportunity to fulfill a childhood dream. The views are incredible both inside and outside. Very unique with repurposed windows with history. Light and airy. Loved the sounds which included the lapping of the lake and train whistles, otherwise quiet and serene. Your only regret would be if you don’t visit the Treehouse. Marsha

What a unique experience! The views are awesome and we had a fantastic time. Our hosts were friendly and engaging which we appreciated very much. They even surprised us with a homemade dessert. If you get the opportunity don’t pass it up!

The treehouse was exquisite and like a dream. The attention to detail, cleanliness, and location were awesome. I'd recommend a sleep mask as the treehouse has a ton of windows to see out of many angles but no curtains. This was no issue to me because I'd figured as much and brought some. There is also a train that goes by, not a big deal but good to know if you're a light sleeper. Lastly I would recommend that you take the stairs inside the treehouse without shoes or socks, my husband actually fell down the inside stairs as they are very smooth and slippery. All in all we had a lovely time and a fantastic and unique experience with a great host. I look forward to returning some day.

This treehouse is simply the best! Such a unique experience with all the comforts and coziness of home. My stay was absolutely picturesque. Perfect spot to relax and enjoy the beautiful lake views from up in the trees. The little touches everywhere were a wonderful surprise - beautiful flowers, fresh bread from the local bakery, raspberry jam and homemade applesauce in the roomy fridge, blankets in the porch chairs for the crisp mornings drinking coffee outside. Wonderfully warm and welcoming hosts. I can’t wait to come back again!

Wow, this was truly an experience like no other! The setting was extraordinary and the treehouse has so much detail you have to see for yourself. We were able to fish off the dock while enjoying the views of beautiful Lake Pend Oreille. We found the place so relaxing and peaceful creating a memory that will last forever.

This place is amazing. Jon and Becky are so great and attend to every little detail to make the unique treehouse experience feel extra special. The weather wasn’t great while I was there, but just sitting inside and watching the water, geese (Harvey and Greta), bald eagles and scenery. Truly a wonderful experience. I enthusiastically recommend this place. 🙏

This treehouse is truly something special! There is so much character in every corner. Combine that with views overlooking the lake and we were enchanted right away! Jon and Becky were gracious hosts, providing a warm welcome and fun history of the treehouse itself. We were cozy and content throughout our stay. Would encourage all to visit this unique place for a getaway!

The answer is "yes"! If you are looking at this listing and wondering, "should I give this a try?", the answer is absolutely "YES!". It is now one of the most favorite places my wife and I have stayed. The pictures actually don't do the treehouse justice. It looks nice in them, and it's even better in person. The location is AMAZING. You wake up to tons of natural light and a resort-like view out on to the lake. All of that and a cup of coffee are an amazing way to start the day. Jon and Becky are exceptional hosts and go out of there way to add lots of little touches to make your stay even better. They are just great people too - which is a huge plus. Again, if you are thinking "maybe", the answer is "yes!" Just do it - you'll be glad you did...

I’ll keep it short: Spectacular
If the treehouse is available, don’t think, book it now.
This tree house experience was amazing! My friend and I were doing some traveling and exploring and this was the best place yet!! 10/10 👌🏼

A truly incredible place to stay! The property and views from the treehouse are amazing. Jon and Becky are so welcoming and hospitable, they made our stay very comfortable. I would definitely recommend...10/10
This place is unreal. Pictures don’t even do it justice. Amazing hospitality as well. You must stay here!!

This is one special place. So unique . What the hosts have created is very special and so relaxing. We were so happy just staying at the treehouse and enjoying the beautiful view and relaxing. I have a more difficult time just chilling and boy did this place help me to do so. It was just perfect. Thank you for what you have created on such a beautiful property.
Thank you.

This was a really fun place to stay! It was beautiful and relaxing. It was super cute and the host even left little treats to eat.
We happened to be here on the night of a thunderstorm. Being in a treehouse during a thunderstorm is loud. I would recommend bringing earplugs.
Because of the weather, we didn't have the opportunity to use all of the outside amenities. Even still both my husband and I would happily recommend the treehouse to others.

Becky and Jon are the best hosts that I have ever encountered. I'm convinced that they do it for fun. Becky left fresh flowers and very nice shampoos and soaps. She is also an organic chef so she leaves delicious treats once in awhile. I can't even make this stuff up. If I were to ever be a host, I would try to be like them. The treehouse was amazing. I felt like we had the best of both worlds. We were very close to all things we needed but I also felt like we were a world away up there. The eagles in the tree were amazing. The train that periodically came by reminded me of my childhood home. We had a storm come in the first night. The treehouse was pretty noisy during that. It didn't bother me at all. I thought it was pretty cool. My husband ended up needing some earplugs to sleep well so maybe pack some of those. You won't regret coming here.

One of the coolest places I've stayed!
Amazing property and hosts! You feel the care and love they have put into this one of a kind hideaway in the trees. The little extras put it over the top. I highly recommend it and can't wait to come back!

This treehouse is the truest example of “even better in-person.” While the photos and description of Jon and Becky’s place look incredible, I assure you that the real thing is even better.
From the moment we set foot on the beautifully maintained premise, Jon and Becky approached with an aura of joy and positivity that stayed with us throughout the remainder of our stay. They had wonderful local suggestions and truly provided an exceptional experience for us.
The treehouse comes exactly as it is described- small but quaint and grants every “escape” one could ask for when looking to take some time away from the hustle and bustle of any city.
If you are lucky enough to find an opening in the reservation schedule, jump on it and do what you need to free up whatever else is on your schedule- it’s worth it.
As with many before us who wrote about their experiences in the guest book, we look forward to our return trip in the (hopeful) near future. Thank you again for providing us with such an memorable getaway, Jon and Becky!

If I could live here I would! The treehouse itself has a neat, eclectic style and I saw something new whenever I looked around. The view was beautiful! The hosts were very sweet to leave a couple of slices of homemade bread, butter, and eggs in the fridge. Jon was always available if we had questions and was super kind. We enjoyed the kayaks and canoe too! The treehouse is located near town with tons of cool restaurants to check out. I can’t wait to go back!
A beautiful place and a one of a kind accommodation!

This treehouse experience was unlike any other! It was beautiful inside and out! It was a great respite and very peaceful. I felt like I was living in a fantasy amongst the living trees! Beautiful grounds and we loved playing pickelball!
Was beyond what we expected! Great hospitality along with the feel of a 5 star hotel all to ourselves. The property and treehouse are world class!
This place is magical...... the hospitality and fun little touches made it so very special for a honeymoon retreat!

This amazing treehouse rental takes your love for the great outdoors to new heights! The lush setting on the water’s edge was so comforting. A spectacular viewpoint to be had for watercolor painting! Climb up to the top floor and you will experience what it’s like to live in the treetops, surrounded by fresh air, Lake Pend Oreille, birds and awesome views. Never left the treehouse! A few horn whistles added to the adventure in the tree! Thank you for checking off my bucket list with a treehouse stay!

Jon and Becky are by far the best Airbnb hosts I’ve ever had. They met us upon arrival, their hospitality was beyond expected and their treehouse was magical. The view from the treehouse was unbelievable. We felt so at home and comfortable.
Nice place!

Where do I begin? It's so amazing its magical. The view of the lake and mountains from any level is breathtaking! The amenities are plenty, their personal touches awesome. The history of it all captivating and you catch yourself reflecting on it. Kayaking the lake in the morning when the water is like a sheet of glass is a must. Your head will never be so clear. Deer eat and play in the yard. And I woke up my last day to a Moose and baby in the yard, just feet away from the treehouse. A MOOSE! The horseback riding in the mountains was fabulous. The local food and fare superb. Farmers Market had the best goodies. Thank you both for sharing God's beautiful gift with me!
The tree house is beautiful, and the hosts were delightful. One of the most memorable places we've ever stayed.

This place was exceptional and way more than we expected! There were so many thoughtful extra touches (eggs,jam and honey in fridge, scones delivered and local coffee). We were able to go on long walks, kayak, canoe and swim right from there. The best was sitting out on the deck in the morning with coffee and in the evening watching the moon come up over the water with eagles flying right next to us. The owners were amazing and great to suggest hikes and restaurants. Would highly recommend to everyone and we will be back.
Exceeded expectations!

Amazing space and right on the lake. If you are looking for something different than the norm this is the place. Jon and Becky were super nice and made sure we had everything we needed, even going so far as to share some freshly picked huckleberries. We wouldn't hesitate to go back and do it again.
AMAZING EXPERIENCE!!!!! We were BLOWN AWAY - it was like a dream!

If you are on the fence about this place, just DO It!!! The place was clean, quaint, and air conditioned. The view was insane, and we loved getting to have our morning coffee on the deck. The hosts provided us with fruit, eggs, cheese, crackers, bagels, and much more.
The pickleball court was a pleasant surprise and we loved having our own private dock! I cannot day enough good things about this place. It went above and beyond our expectations! We can’t wait to go back.
Truly a unique experience.

This amazing treehouse, right on the bank of Lake Pend Oreille, is the best airbnb I've experienced in my 10 years of traveling. Becky gave me a tour when I arrived. I was in incredulous delight because there were so many artsy, unique, and thoughtful touches. The photos are great, but experiencing the space as a whole was an entirely different level of charm and whimsy. The decorating and restoration of antique furnishings and appliances is brilliant . I especially loved the bronze -fronted fridge (which held organic o.j., homemade raspberry jam, cheese, eggs, and English muffins. I slept like a baby in the cozy, comfy loft bed. There are lots of high quality toiletries, guest bathrobes, and great reading material such as a book of treehouses of the world. There are binoculars to focus on the bald eagles and osprey near the lake. I ended up spending most of my time in the living room or on the porch of the treehouse, just soaking in the panoramic view. I didn't want to leave to go visit anywhere else. And I didn't want to leave when my check-out time rolled around. I'll be back, but next time for a longer stay!

My wife and I had a wonderful, restful time. Great view of the water. The treehouse was definitely one of a kind with lots of craftsmanship details. We are definitely considering coming back again sometime!
Amazing place. Couldn’t have had a better stay. Truly a special place!

The pictures do not do this place justice.
The location has a quaint, rustic, and wonderfully cozy feel. The views of the lake are breathtaking and awe-inspiring, and it's such a wonderful and welcoming place. We mainly interacted with Becky, who was the picture perfect hostess, even going so far as to give us banana bread as a parting gift! We even stayed an extra day, and Jon was super chill and helpful when it came to pushing our stay forward.
The main thing this place has going for it is its uniqeness. Nobody you ever known has ever stayed in a place quite like this, and I even took a video on my phone to show folks back home. "Wow" and "where is that??" were the universal reactions to the video. The kitchen is fully stocked, down to even a blender, and fresh greens, orange juice, and local coffee beans, in the fridge, and more besides. It's hard to put into words how lovely our stay was there, and we'd undoubtedly do it again.
The one thing I would say is that the location was not quite as private as we were expecting. It is located on the family's property, and they often have children and grandchildren visiting, so even though the main house is a good 75 yards from the treehouse, the dock is right in front of the treehouse, so if you're there on a romantic weekend, don't plan on just strutting around naked like you own the place, as there are many large windows and absolutely no curtains. This isn't a knock against the place, though - merely something we didn't quite get from the listing. I'd still recommend it in a heartbeat. We're extremely pleased. :)

Beautiful and unique stay for our wedding night. Can't wait to return and stay again- very close to town, amazing views, and thoughtfully designed. Would absolutely recommend to anyone, it's worth the value and is something cool to talk about when you describe to others that you stayed in a tree house.
This really is a special place.

This was seriously the coolest place we’ve ever stayed. The treehouse is so cozy and the property is gorgeous! If you are on the fence just do it, words don’t do this place justice. It was absolutely wonderful.

This place is amazing...so cozy and perfect. Unfortunately, a freak windstorm moved in and our 2 night stay turned into a very short one night stay. 50 mile an hr winds...while the treehouse didn't move and sway, the winds created loud, loud noises. Kind of scary. We hope to return to experience the full benefits of this special treehouse.

We felt like we were staying in a little fairy house! This tree house is filled with charm and special little touches! And the grounds around are beautifully landscaped with terrific access to the lake right outside the door! It was even better than we had imagined and we hope we are fortunate enough to stay here again some day!
What an incredible experience. We had so much fun being up in the tree :-) it was well equipped comfortable and such a unique experience we will be telling our friends about it!

Perfect place to have a nice quiet weekend away from the stresses in your life! There is nothing like waking up to a warm cup of coffee and sitting out on the most perfect deck with most perfect view!!

Expect to be thrilled!! It is a beautiful treehouse right on the lake. Well maintained landscaping. Be prepared to walk aways through wet grass from your car to the treehouse. As you probably have read, the stairs are part spiral and part straight-up both outside and in. I got the hang of it pretty quickly, but don't bring a ton of luggage or bags (especially if you are solo) or it will be a struggle. They have everything you need kitchen-wise--no toaster oven or regular oven, but there is a stovetop and a microwave. The bed and a closet are all that is on the second floor (wonderful bed!) so, if you get up often in the night you will have to carefully go down the steep stairs to the very cool galley bathroom! There is a floor above the bedroom as well, where you can look out through the trees at all the beauty, or it makes a great meditation area--very steep ladder to get up there.
All in all, I had a wonderful solo trip--it isn't far from town at all for dining out and shopping in Sandpoint--I love their food coop right on the edge of town, there is a spa on the way to town (Highland) if you would like a massage or facial, etc., and so much more!
I would love to go back to the treehouse next year--it is so unique!

Had a great stay at the treehouse. Was not totally sure what to expect but I was completely blown away by the location (right on the water with gorgeous views that you can see from the deck or living room) and hospitality (lots of nice touches like eggs, english muffins, OJ and coffee waiting for us so we could hang out in the treehouse for breakfast). The other nice surprise was how comfortable the bed was. My husband and I had been on a 10 day road trip and it was definitely the comfiest bed we slept in. Would not hesitate to stay here again, I didn't want to leave!
This place is really magical! Hard to leave. The hosts even had breakfast makings in the fridge, as well as coffee, cream and OJ. Highly recommend it, it’s a great experience!
If you are having any reservation on whether to book this or not, DO IT!! It’s worth it!!!
Comfort & relaxation with a wonderful view!

Wow! The treehouse looked great in the pictures but is even better when you get there. The grounds are meticulously cared for, lush, green and beautiful. The treehouse itself is just amazing. So many little touches and so functional for such a unique space. We loved the top lookout floor for reading with the breeze coming in through the windows. The bed was very comfy. The lake is right at your feet and we loved the use of the private dock with kayaks and paddle boards each day. There are also natural stone stairs leading into the lake if you don't want to jump off the dock for a swim. This place is so peaceful and private. The hosts were great and on our second night during a wind and thunderstorm Hailey even texted us offering to have us hang out with them at their place if we felt unsafe, which was very thoughtful. We chose to stay in the treehouse during the storm which was a pretty cool experience in itself! We stayed for three nights and were so sad to leave. Every minute we spent here was relaxing and joyous, such a wonderful place!

This is such a wonderful place. My daughter, 21, and I went to celebrate my 50th birthday.
This place was so relaxing for us. We had coffee on the deck, then went down to the boat dock, then to the 3rd floor where we read and I took a nap. There are so many cozy places to hang out.
There were a pair of Bald Eagles in one of the "tree house" trees.
We also picked raspberries as there were more than enough for everyone. This was an absolutely wonderful weekend.
Unique treehouse on beautiful grounds with fabulous views!
Expect an amazing experience. Be sure to ask host for recommendations because they will send you the best ideas. Can not say enough.
One of a kind experience! Loved it!
The treehouse is magical and creates an experience to remember.

We loved being right on the lake in this unique space. It was great having use of a canoe and kayaks to explore the lake. The treehouse itself is so fun and artsy. Hailey provided some nice extras. We enjoyed just hanging out in the cozy space enjoying all the thoughtful touches.

My boyfriend and I stayed two nights in the treehouse for his birthday and it was absolutely amazing. The location, cleanliness and general atmosphere of the place is all unbeatable. Truly a magical experience, even bald eagles flying around the treehouse most of the day! There was even fresh eggs and homemade apple butter in the fridge for us! Both of us so were beyond sad to leave, and we will definitely be back as we’ve completely fallen in love with the treehouse! Best Airbnb experience yet. Book more than two nights. You'll be glad you did.

On the lake and only a couple minutes from town, this treehouse makes for an amazing weekend. The space is very unique, stocked with every amenity we needed and bonus; the bed is very comfortable. I highly recommended this home for anyone in need of a relaxing lake getaway.

The 2 night reservation in the treehouse was a gift from my husband for my 64th birthday. It will go down as one of the most memorable. Hailey greeted us upon arrival to guide us to the treehouse Hailey is so welcoming and very laid back..her personal touch (fresh fruit bowl & fresh flowers) add a special welcome as you walk thru the door. The beautiful stained glass door (glass compliments of Ireland) immediately tells you..this is a treehouse like no other! For me, it was jaw dropping beautiful..hand carved wooden couch with overstuffed pillows and windows that offer a panoramic view of the beauty that surrounds you. Seated right on the lake you can sit on the porch to enjoy sunrise/sunset; or, walk down to your own private beach and dock.
California king bed guarantees a good night's sleep..you don't need to bring your own pillow from home, the ones provided are perfect. Inside and out the treehouse is a once in a lifetime adventure.
Unbelievable! You have to check this place out. It’s one of a kind!
Best experience ever!

Wonderful place! If you don't stay here a couple nights, you're crazy! the host were wonderful! just a text away from anything you need! kayaks and paddle boards free to use! nesting Bald Eagles that would fly by and perch nearby! such a wonderful unique experience, I will be staying here again!

Awesome, awesome experience ! The pictures are pretty accurate, but there is so much more to this treehouse than shown. Its the little details that make this place special. Wonderful hosts and family, beautiful views, cozy to the nth degree! An experience to remember !

Jon and Becky were the most gracious hosts that anyone could ever ask for. Everything about their hospitality and the amazing tree-house exceeded our expectations. Staying there was such a unique experience that we will never forget. We really felt like it was our own private place, in our own little world. We will always be thankful for the memories and definitely want to come back again someday! Thanks Jon and Becky!

We had the good fortune of staying at the Treehouse on Lake Pend O’reille for 3 nights in early August. The photos don’t disappoint. The treehouse is unique and the views are amazing. Jon and Becky are thoughtful hosts and their property is a small slice of paradise. We would definitely return and we highly recommend Jon’s place if you’re seeking a unique and beautiful lodging on the lake, with full use of your own dock, kayaks and paddle boards, very handy access to both paved and mountain bike trails, and in close proximity to Dover and Sandpoint. So relaxing. Thank you, Jon & Becky!
A simply fantastic place! Jon and Becky were fantastic hosts. The treehouse is absolutely perfect. Thanks for an amazing anniversary!
Everything it says it is! Fantastic hosts and family!
This treehouse is amazing!! Secluded but close to town. Such a cool place with an incredible view, and Jon and Becky are so great!

A perfect place to get out and relax and enjoy beautiful scenery and have a time to remember. Very welcoming and great hospitality. We highly recommend this place for anyone who loves having an amazing vacation.
We loved our sweet getaway in this perfect treehouse on the lake. Jon and Becky were so sweet and hospitable. We definitely plan to make this an annual trip.
What a pleasure to stay here. The tree house was quirky in a wonderful way and the grounds are beautiful. A truly peaceful setting.
A wonderfully unique experience!
The hospitality, the uniqueness of the accomodations... everything was wonderful!

Our stay at the tree house exceeded our expectations! Spectacularly built and wonderfully designed and decorated. Extremely cozy and comfortable spaces to relax in. The experience was unlike any other! We loved the entire stay and are looking forward to visiting again!

We knew as soon as we saw the listing this place would be special, and we were not disappointed. We were looking for a quiet getaway from our busy lives and the treehouse provided just that. The view couldn't be beat and with a couple eagles that liked to occupy one of the trees above us, we were treated to wonderful sounds each morning. This treehouse is a gem from the perfect decor down to the small design details. Absolutely beautifully made.
Jon and Becky were gracious hosts, meeting with us to give us a little history of the peppery (also beautiful) and making sure we felt at home.
If our travels ever bring us back to this area, we will return to this peaceful getaway.
Jon was awesome to us.

Jon and Becky have a a truly extraordinary place! As soon as I saw the listing I knew I wanted to stay there. And it was even more wonderful than I could have predicted. First off the treehouse is full of character - the detail and design from the unique design features to the furniture gives it such a homey feel, and the views are spectacular - not to mention being among the trees. Being right on the lake was perfect for a relaxing weekend - you can enjoy a cup of coffee and watch the sunrise from the porch or living room, sit on the dock, or kayak on the lake. Jon gave an informational tour when I arrived of the history of the treehouse and a run down of some things to do in the area - he was a gracious host and helpful as I began to plan out my weekend. I would highly recommend staying at the treehouse - it is a once in a lifetime opportunity and Jon and Becky couldn't have been more kind and welcoming!
The tree house was amazing! We had a private dock with beautiful views all weekend. And not mention outstanding hospitality! We will definitely be back again

This place was absolutely perfect in every way. I need to come back. I posted pictures on Instagram and so many of friends responded that they want to come stay here too! It was the most magical weekend away and Jon and Becky are fabulously attentive and caring hosts!!
This is a wonderful place to stay while in Sandpoint. The Treehouse is truly magnificent, and the setting is gorgeous, you are right on the lake and very close to town.

We had a great time staying in Jon's treehouse. Jon was there to greet us and gave us a very nice tour. There is a dock you can use, and the treehouse is surprisingly spacious! I would definitely recommend staying here!
It's even more amazing than I thought it would be. Wish we could have moved in forever.

If you are wanting a lovely, scenic, amazing experience you must come to the treehouse. Jon and Becky are amazing and super nice. You'll learn about how the treehouse was built. It is a wonderful stay, and you can enjoy the beauty of Lake Pend Oreille. We were able to use their canoe to out on the lake which was so fun. Our stay was so wonderful and we can't wait to go back.

This place is amazing from the moment you step out of your car. The setting on the lake and the amazing tree house. You just can't stop smiling at the thought you are in a tree house! Jon and Becki are great and gave us a fabulous tour on arrival. The tree house history adds even more to the experience. Truly, nothing could have been better...except we had to leave!!

Wonderful experience sleeping between trees! The view was incredible, the place was beautifully decorated with nice amenities. Also very short drive to downtown Sandpoint. Jon and Becky were great hosts, they let us take their canoe for a spin, and were very helpful.

Jon made sure that he was there to greet us upon arrival, and he walked us through the treehouse to show us every detail, and also gave us some neat information on how the place was built! This was truly a wonderful weekend getaway, it is very peaceful with the most beautiful view! I highly recommend Jon and Becky as hosts, and we will definitely be booking another stay in the future!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the treehouse! It was the most perfect getaway and a completely unique experience. The artistry and craftsmanship of this little gem is very impressive, every detail is fascinating. Although the weather was rainy during our trip, the sitting area was inviting and we enjoyed sipping tea, staring out of the huge picture window at the breathtaking views of Lake Pend O'reille. I wish this was my house!! We could not have asked for a more peaceful and relaxing weekend. Thank you so much for sharing your lovely home with us...can't wait to come back!

Can not speak highly enough about this place. There were homemade cookies waiting for us and Becky gave us a quick tour of the house. The tree house has an amazing view of the lake and we were able to fish and use their kayaks and paddle boards. Jon was easy to get in touch with when needed and his wife was very warm and friendly. I. showed pictures of this to my wife's parents and they want to drive up from Idaho falls to stay here, that's how much we enjoyed it.

This treehouse is a special place. The view is epic. Jon and Becky are kind and welcoming. I've rarely met nicer people. If you're up for an experience and open to the particulars of treehouse living, you should stay here.
Clean and easy to find. The small things made the stay nice.

This location was amazing! Within walking distance to downtown, right next to the water, and activities both at the location site as well as in town! Our stay was so relaxing!! What's better thank waking up and drinking a cup of coffee on the deck and watching the water!?! Explore downtown and enjoy some local cuisine or hangout at one of the 2 pools, or even just walk around the property.
Sarah was quick to respond to any question, check in and check out were a breeze, absolutely would stay here again!! A must stay location in Sandpoint!! Thank you for a wonderful weekend!!!

great place, right on the water in a walking town. minutes to walk to everything. quick drive to all grocery stores. If i had to find anything wrong, i could only say that the pull out couch isn't much of a bed, and the sheets dont fit, but it's fine for kids. Will return for sure!
Beautiful place. I would stay again. Sarah was very responsive!

This little cozy gem was fantastic! We felt right at home. The condo was very clean and inviting. We felt a lot of detail went into making us feel comfortable. We very much appreciate the care. We highly recommend.
We had an excellent stay here while we went to the Sandpoint Music Festival. We will be coming back again!

Well, the only negative was that I didn’t book more nights. :). This is an amazing place. I wanted to get out to do everything. I was sad that I was also working a lot while I was here. The internet is perfect if you need to work. I really want to come back. It’s amazing.

We can't say enough positive comments to reflect the outstanding quality of Sarah's Place condo and its beautiful location. My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our time in Sandpoint and our stay in the very clean and up-to-date condo was the "frosting on the cake." Our only regret is that our stay was way too short as the condo provided us the quiet and relaxing environment that we were seeking for a short get away from home. Sarah's Place condo will be our place of choice as we plan future vacations. Thank you for opening your beautiful condo to us as it was exactly what we were hoping to find.
Lisa was a great host- flexible and offered great local recommendations. The place is just like the pictures- modern, clean, and private. We enjoyed our stay! Thank you!
We enjoyed our stay at the cabin very much! It was very cozy and peaceful, located in a nice neighborhood and only a short walk to downtown Sandpoint.

The cabin was cozy and just as described. My partner and I loved the fireplace and the ambiance.
You can tell it was built with care. Beautiful wood finishing a ans thoughtful design. All the amenities you could want for a cozy small town getaway.
Lisa was incredibly responsive and accommodating. 💯 recommend and will definitely return.

The cabin was perfect! The owners were meticulous in its design, construction and furnishing. The neighborhood is very quiet and it is walking distance to a great natural food store and bakery that we enjoyed. We would definitely stay here again if and when we visit Sand Point.
We enjoyed our stay here. The cabin is clean and cozy. It’s close to restaurants and grocery stores. We had a lovely time here.
The townie cabin was a perfect couples get away. Perfect walking distance to the lake and downtown. Highly recommend staying here.
Great little cabin! Love staying here. Lisa is the best 😁
Lisa’s place was wonderful!! We love it, and we will definitely go back.
The cabin was just as described and very clean. The instructions for entry and amenities were clear and easy.

The accommodations were exactly as described and perfect for my husband and me. The design is efficient and clever. Sandpoint is a great town and this home is easily within walking distance to downtown. Thank you. We will definitely be returning.

Loved staying here! Sooo cozy and warm. Felt very peaceful. Didn’t have a tv or microwave but not having the tv actually helped us disconnect from the hustle and bustle of running around. Very peaceful and serene.

Such a nice little city cabin. Perfect for a couple getaway. Very quiet and relaxing and close to shops/restaurants. No TV but for a romantic getaway, it was fine. Kitchen stocked well with cooking supplies and coffee/tea also. Highly recommend this place.
Cabin was just how it was advertised, plenty of room for parking and a very clean and organized atmosphere! I would recommend their cabin to anyone!

The cabin is a delightful spot in Sandpoint with all the amenities you could wish for. It is VERY clean and well equipped. Loved the loft area and the fireplace! Nice touches. The washer and dryer came in handy, too! It's a little further away from town than expected but a lovely stroll especially if the weather is nice!
Beautiful quiet little cabin for two! Love that it is an easy walking distance to downtown yet still makes you feel secluded and private! Would stay again!

My girlfriend and I had a wonderful weekend staying here, it's very clean, and the location is perfect. Highly recommend.
Great location. Great design and the bed is very comfortable
Excellent location and Bret is awesome! Place comes with 2 bikes that makes traveling around town a breeze! Great location with everything one could need
We loved this place in Sandpoint. It’s close to downtown and near the lake. The bed is so comfortable and one of the cleanest places we’ve stayed in!
Great location. Easy walk downtown and to 3rd street pier.

This cozy, new studio is perfectly located for walking to the beach and downtown in a quiet neighborhood. Nice, easy to operate TV, coffee maker (coffee and creamer provided), comfy bed and great shower (wonderful pressure)! We’d definitely love to stay again!
Great place to stay with a lot to offer. Also a 5 minute bike ride from any major landmark in town!
Hands down one of the best values in Sandpoint! Two block walk to the water and a 15 minute walk to downtown.

Very comfortable stay with great amenities. Great host.
I do think the cost is excessive for the size of the studio though.
Perfect location, nicely designed - it was a quiet and comfortable spot for our road trip stopover.
Clean and well appointed. Needs a bigger hot water tank so that you are not sprinting to finish your shower.

This is our second time visiting Chapel by the Pier. This cottage is in a great location very close to the downtown core. It is also within walking distance to the 3rd street Pier. The cottage is private, the bed is very comfortable, and the shower is powerful. We recommend this place!

The location is amazing. I went almost the whole week without needing to get in my car. Bret is a great host. Available and responsive, but very respectful of guest's privacy. The space is small, but the balcony is a great feature, especially if you have a pet. My cat loved it. I did cook a few meals in the unit, despite the limited cooking amenities (microwave and small fridge). There are many restaurant and a natural market close by. All in all, a nice spot.

Loved our stay at Bret’s place! Quiet peaceful studio walking distance to restaurants and shops! Bret’s place was clean and bed was super comfortable! Thanks Bret for the stay and the great tips on where to eat and hang in town!
Ideal location. Within walking distance of downtown, restaurants, and lake. Very friendly neighborhood. Bret always replied promptly when had a question and make sure all was OK. Great bathroom.

Chapel by the Pier is located in a very convenient and quiet location near to downtown Sandpoint. It is easy to find and it is also near to the water, both the lake and the river. This is a modern rental with beautiful glass church glass windows. It's private and has all the modern conveniences one would need. It is adequately separate from the host's residence. The bed was very comfortable, the shower was lovely. We were advised to be judicious using the hot water. We had no problem having enough hot water for two showers a day in 5 days of staying there. The lighting was great in the rental. The sliding glass door gave us some fresh air. Bret responded to any needs we had and he communicated very well checking to see if we had all that we needed. We liked the place so much that we're going back in June!

Great location - love being in walking distance to restaurants. The set up is nice above the garage so you are not on top of people. Bret was a good communicator which is always helpful. Cute place, comfy bed, and remodeled bath. The garage was an added bonus we were not expecting.

Bret is a great host! We didn’t get to meet him in person, but his communication was great. Super cute space with a fantastic bathroom, comfy bed and a great kitchenette with big sink, refrigerator, microwave and a Keurig coffee maker! The TV was easy to use and had great sound. It was also nice to bring our dog with us and to have the use of the garage. I highly recommend Bret!
Very clean, very close to town, Very nice modern remodel, has all the basic necessities. Dogs allowed was a big plus. Highly recommend.
Great clean little suite close to town! Awesome communication!

What a great spot! Bret's studio is super clean, walking distance to town and Lake Pend Oreille. Bret checked in and was very easy to communicate with. Being able to park in a garage is also a treat especially with recreational toys in the car. The bed was comfy as well. Very easy and convenient stay. Would definitely recommend!
Great place!
